title: ADVANCE GTA
description: Liberty City is the place where you will take the first steps in the journey to conquer GTA. While trying to escape the crime city to rebuild his life, there have been incidents with the character Mike. His close friend Vinnie became the victim of a bombing, and this made him crave revenge. The pain and loss will be offset by the tasks of destroying the building or defeating the enemies assigned by the system. Of course, all the necessary equipment or weapons will be able to be obtained in one of two ways: buying in the game’s store, or looting from others. On an unspecified aspect, there are 100 mysterious packages, or supplies, that are hidden everywhere. They play an essential role in helping characters survive in a society full of injustice and danger. Sometimes, the police will mobilize armed forces to catch players, or when a Gangster team hunts, it will be difficult without a machine gun or explosive bombs.

title: Advance Wars
description: Orange Star and Blue Moon are two neighboring countries that have a harmonious relationship and always help each other to develop altogether. But then, a terrible thing happened when the Blue Moon shogun retired, and Olaf is the one that took over. He is a wicked and greedy person that has always wanted to invade Orange Star to expand the territory, and furthermore, dominates all of the four neighboring countries. Shortly after that, the war began. Olaf’s army seems to be well-prepared in terms of power and supplies. The player is a military advisor of one of the 4 in danger nations, who is going to fulfill the missions against all enemies to bring peace and safety to all citizens.

title: Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising
description:
Anyone who missed the first version of “Advance Wars” probably won’t really be regret, as this second release is developed independently with an easy-to-grasp storyline, along with many technical improvements. An overview of the whole gameplay, which is typical for strategy games, so that players will not take too much time to understand how it works. With a series of lands being occupied by enemies, you will need to bring your army to regain what belongs to. However, victory or defeat largely depends on the control and deployment of units of troops in each attack. In a shorter, more concise way is the tactical elements.
The remainder of the unknown is soldiers. They have special abilities, gaining a particular advantage on the battlefield. For example, tanks and artillery have a more significant and further range of influence, while warriors dressed in blue and wearing helmets can cause all machines to stop working whenever they approach. A bit of comparison, the Army force is almost redesigned, with a cuter, crowder, and more dangerous style.

title: Aladdin GBA
description: Jafar is known as an evil warlock. Although he is considered to be the most loyal adviser to the king of Agrabah, he has devoted his life to research power and attempted to acquire the universe, far beyond Agrabah. In order to achieve this, he needed an oil lamp in the tomb called the Cave of Wonders. But it contains a lot of dangers and requires “the diamond in the rough” to safely get in.

title: Astro Boy: Omega Factor
description: Astro is a half-robot boy. After his unfortunate death from an accident, Dr. Phoenix reincarnated him by using modern technology to transplant the robot cells into his body. Therefore, he has an eternal love for humanity and considers his own destiny is to end the evils. Sharaku is a man who devised a plot to use Death Mask to conquer the whole world. He kidnapped Duke Red to activate the terminal device and harnessed its power. As the plan goes succeed, a series of devastating robots were born to destroy the lives. Astro is summoned to restore internal peace to the Earth. But it all happened so fast, and he needed a Death Mask to make the device to reverse time.

title: Banjo-Kazooie – Grunty’s Revenge
description: Ending the fact of the previous version, the evil witch Gruntilda has been sealed under a giant mountain, and will probably never escape. The estimate was correct, but Banjo and Kazooie did not expect that her soul was still possible. The emergence of the mad scientist Klungo has brought a great danger. He invented a destructive robot and merged into Gruntilda’s soul. Soon, the world will quickly be overwhelmed by pain. In the face of the helplessness of the two heroes, the kind warlock Mumbo Jumbo offers hope when it comes to time travel plans. He will bring the duo back to a time in the past where they can destroy bad guys forever.

title: Batman: Vengeance
description: In Gotham City, criminals are working again, and they are even stronger than before. While trying to stop the underground transactions, the criminal couple Joker and Harley Quinn have always appeared and stopped him promptly. In one event, a woman named Mary was kidnapped. Batman tracked down and rescued her at the chemical factory, then discovered the existence of a strange chemical being illegally produced. However, this woman said that her little son Toby was kidnapped by Joker, forcing him to go to the Gotham Bridge. Although he knew that this clown had devised a plan of death, the dark knight still decided to come. Then, he learned that all the stories were drawn by him. After the battle, he returned to the factory with the mystery of the strange chemical. The analysis said that those chemicals own the ability to transform any type of plant into a ghostly living creature. Who stands behind this deadly plan? And what is his ultimate goal at all?

title: Beyblade G-Revolution
description: Continuing the story from the previous version, BEYBLADE G-REVOLUTION begins with the BEYBLADE world championship event. The Bladebreakers, Kai, Ray, and Max, left the team and went their separate ways to claim the championship. Hilary, Kenny, Daichi Sumeragi and Hiro Granger joined Tyson to form a new team, while Max joined PPB All Starz, Ray joined White Tiger X and Kai joined Blitzkrieg Boys. The championship has been a third of the race when Tyson noticed the return of Boris (from BEGA) and announced that they would win the championship at all costs. At that time, the Beyblade stores temporarily stopped operating and refused to serve people, only supplying the necessary parts for BEGA. This caused some difficulties for Tyson’s team, but soon, Kenny came up with a solution that was to use hard metal and some other accessories to adjust the Beyblade of the team. However, they still lack a member. At that moment, Kai’s team was eliminated by the Brooklyn team. Kai returned to the Bladebreakers and the tournament continued to be extremely intense.

title: Boktai: The Sun is in Your Hand
description: The story begins when the civilization period begins to collapse. People are slowly dying to the curse, disease, and a new Age of Darkness begins. There, creatures called Immortals to grow and turn living people into prey for meat. Many cities are covered by death, including San Miguel and Istrakan, where Immortals hunters have also been defeated. But it seems that God has mercy for the suffering of humankind that he sends a ray of hope. It is Django, a boy who possesses a weapon created by sunlight: Gun Del Sol.

title: Breath of Fire II
description: BREATH OF FIRE 2 revolves around Ryu. Since the age of six, he has become an orphan. His mother was killed by dragons years ago, and the rest of the family is still mysteriously missing. On a walk outside the town, he met a dragon and learned about his own changing fate. But that was soon forgotten when Ryu met Bow and adventure together on the continent. Ten years later, as adults, they were caught in a crime of theft and forced to flee the town of HOMETOWN. Bow felt that it’s unfair. Therefore, he did not accept this injustice situation, and then the two investigated to find the real culprit. In the process, they discover a mystery related to the true destiny of the protagonist that he was warned ten years ago.

title: CT Special Forces
description: Ever since the beginning of the first battle in CT Special Force, I’ve mistakenly thought that I was experiencing Metal Slug. You are in the role of a mercenary, whose mission is to capture the military areas attacked by enemies. At the same time, implement the plan set out earlier to burn the store of food, ammunition of the enemy, causing them to retreat. For the first levels, they are quite simple. The system will default to a pistol and rudimentary weapons such as armor, helmets, and a hook. But every time you kill the other guards or rescue a hostage being held, you will be given very useful spoils, including machine guns, submachine guns, bullets, bombs, and even some extra-potion. The effect will be clearly shown when players destroy enemies more quickly and have the ability to fight bosses in some stages. Unfortunately, the slope of the difficulty is quite high and increases rapidly. Therefore, develop character control techniques to capture the process and avoid losing your life during the battle.

title: Cars
description: Lightning McQueen has always dreamed of racing on the streets of Radoder Springs, about a large-scale tournament for him so that he can have the opportunity to confront the “speed demons”. On one of his visits to the Cozy Cone Hotel, he met Sally Carrera and learned about the Piston Cup tournament that was about to take place. Fillmore, Mater, and Mack help McQueen with practicing new skills as well as passing the qualifying round at Butte of Willy. At there, they met Chick Hicks, a mysterious racer, who is likely to become one of the most dangerous opponents to deal with. When the race to the Tailfin Pass, a group of self-proclaimed Tuners, consisting of 4 members appeared and caused troubles. They challenged Lightning to a one-on-four race which made him be badly injured afterward. In the latest comeback, Chick appeared with the Tuners, and this sparked doubts about an unfair season

title: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow
description: The vampire lord Dracula was defeated by a vampire hunting race called Belmont 35 years ago. He is hanged and sealed his power on an eclipse so that he cannot be reborn again. However, a prophecy was made soon after, that his rebirth would be born in the ghost castle, and inherit all the power and anger of Dracula within 35 years. At that time, a boy named Soma Cruz, with his friend Mina Hakuba went to the Hakuba temple ruins. Afterward, they were taken into a mysterious castle. Met Genya Arikado, together, they fight against the monsters appearing everywhere. Thanks to this event, Soma discovered his ability to absorb the souls, and that also helped him survive the dangers. Later, witch Yoko Belnades appeared. She reveals that Dracula’s reincarnation is in this castle, and he will kill everyone when fully inheriting the power of darkness, after the end of the lunar eclipse.

title: Castlevania: Circle of the Moon
description: A decade ago, when the conflict between the Belmont people and Dracula’s vampire army had come to its climax, a massive battle broke out and caused many deaths, including the parents of the protagonist – Nathan Graves. Since then, he has always been aware of revenging that he continuously practice so that he could be able to face the enemies of his life one day. Thanks to the help of the patriarch Morris Baldwin, Nathan became one of the most powerful warriors and was given the Belmont clan’s “Hunter Whip” weapon, which was made Prince Hugh discontented. During a battle at the old castle, the destruction of Dracula caused Nathan and Hugh to fall into a tunnel and lost Morris. But then, the prince went to search for his father and left Nathan alone. While fighting against the eternal enemies, he also needs to search for his mentor.

title: Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance
description: Castlevania: Harmony of Dissonance takes place in the background of 50 years after Simon Belmont annihilated Dracula. At that time, Juste Belmont, who has just turned 16, is one of the youngest talented and also known as a young descendant to be awarded the Vampire Killer. Maxim Kischine, who is Juste’s best friend, decided to leave his race and explore the world on his own. 2 years later, he returned and announced that Lydie – their childhood friend was kidnapped in the castle in which Dracula once lived. Together, they searched for Lydie, but after entering the castle, Juste realized that someone had tried to revive the villain who had spread the curse of destroying the world 50 years ago. And no one else, it is Maxim. He is jealous and wants to show off his power when he tries to revive and destroy Dracula again, but things turn out a worse way when infected with dark energy.

title: Contra Advance – The Alien Wars Ex
description: From an early age, Bill was abandoned by his parents in the chaos. Luckily, he was adopted by the army captain and taught combat skills then. Growing up, he becomes an extremely brave and excellent soldier. Over the past several years, Bill has achieved great feats by constantly stopping the Red Falcon’s plan, as he was always trying to cause wars to dominate the whole world. In this comeback, he associates with aliens and decides to destroy the entire human civilization. Fortunately, the satellites have detected the instability when they continuously detect some spacecraft spying around. Bill is sent on duty to investigate as well as prevent the upcoming hazards.

title: Crash Bandicoot 2: N-Tranced
description: Previously, when trying to create a device to shrink the Earth, Doctor Neo Cortex failed by the barrier from the hero Crash. But with his comeback this time, he has become even more terrifying when he collaborates with other wicked people who share the same goal: Uka Uka and N. Trance. They know that Crash is the only threat that could ruin every plan, and his weaknesses are his close friends. Consequently, they abduct Crunch and Coco and then take them to another dimension. The orange hero is not affected, but creates a Fake version as a consequence, has a vicious disposition, and stands on the side of the villain. This made him feel quite confused and a bit difficult. But luckily, at that time, Aku Aku appeared and helped him. Together they will defeat the wicked ones as well as rescue their friends.

title: Crash Bandicoot XS (Paracox)
description: Once again, Doctor Neo Cortex’s plan to invade Earth failed. Uka Uka felt sad and said that he would come back again for revenge. Sometime later, they traveled together across the universe to search for white crystals to power a special device called Planetary Minimizer. As a result, they succeeded and caused the Earth to shrink to the size of an orange. While they were celebrating with gusto and joy, Crash and his friends searched for purple crystals to reverse Minimizer’s transformation. In the event facing Crash, Cortex had a thought to shrink him. But unfortunately, the bullet hit the purple crystal, causing it to bounce back and damage the device. The effects then unite the evil doctor’s army into a Mega-Mix giant monster. Despite bringing everything back to normal, the squad of heroes faces another danger.

title: Crash Bandicoot: The Huge Adventure
description: Doctor Neo Cortex was formerly a citizen of the Earth. He had the intention of controlling the whole world and seizing all power by waging wars. However, Crash Bandicoot promptly discovered this conspiracy and stopped it. It is this that made him lost everything and was expelled from the Earth to avoid future dangers. But people did not expect this, his greed and hatred grew that he built a device that could reduce in size of any object based on the power of the crystal ball that he found over the years. Earth was the first goal that Cortex thinks of. When Crash discovered the plan, it seemed too late to stop it because the Earth had been scaled down to the size of an orange. In order to bring everything back to its original state, Crash needs to search for the opposite crystal stones as well as destroy Cortex and also is his device so that this will not happen again. Despite many difficulties ahead, Coco and her friend Aku Aku will accompany him.

title: Crash Nitro Kart
description: Crash Bandicoot is a talented racing driver that totally loved by everyone. During a walk in the woods with friends – Coco and Crunch, Doctor Neo Cortex along with his army appeared and kidnapped them. For such a long time, Cortex had always had hatred on Crash and wanted to defeat him at all costs. Therefore, he abducted him and his friends. They were taken to an arena of another galaxy ruled by Emperor Velo XXVII. The race is held here with the participation of many opponents from different planets. Velo warned that, before completing four races in four different universes, if any team was eliminated, their planet would be destroyed, and the final winners would be released to freedom. Crash and his friends are really worried about this, and they are unaware that Velo is also one of their rivals in this race.

title: Crash of the Titans
description:
Crash Bandicoot, with his sister Coco and his friends, came to the island of Wumpa to start a peaceful farmer’s life. While trying to fix the butter processing equipment, Coco and Aku Aku were kidnapped by Dr. Neo Cortex then put on a balloon. Luckily, the butter maker broke the strings so that they escaped, but fell into a forest. They didn’t expect that this was a plan to distract everyone from letting Aku Aku steal Mojo. Cortex planned to create an army of mutants and build a machine to destroy the Doominator to rule the world. Crash promptly stops that, but not completely. Doominator is still in the process of development and completion. Before this threat is officially put into operation, Crash needs to find the last base of the enemy to destroy it entirely.
Wumpa Island, Lumber Yard, N. Sanity Island, Uka Tree, and the Doominator base are five areas that players need to defeat in order to complete the storyline. Quests in almost every stage involve collecting Mojo for a limited period of time. However, they are not available, which have been taken by enemies. Therefore, the only way to get Mojo is to defeat them all.
Unlike previous versions, “Crash of the Titans” is more about action role-playing element than adventure. For that reason, the main character, Crash, has some special abilities to become stronger. Clearer, it is the ability to transform whenever he defeats an enemy. It brings new fighting skills as well as the defense is much increased after that. But if the damage is too much, they will disappear, put Crash back to his original state.
About difficulties, although I have never mentioned earlier, you might have already understood that they will develop proportional to the plot. The closer you get to the Doominator base, the harder it is. Therefore, you obviously also be defeated a few times when facing some bosses at the end of each stage, most notably: Arachnina, Uka Uka, Battler, and Ee-Lectric. Fortunately, the developer is not so callous to let the characters die without any help. Do you remember the Mojo? They are very useful, not a useless item at all. Combine them with the “golden fruit” on the island of Wumpa for an extra life. Besides, eating the fruits found along the way will improve the vitality indicators.

title: DONKEY KONG COUNTRY 3
description: The third part of the DKC Series began when King K. Rool, with his henchmen, was planning to steal bananas and invade the island ruled by Donkey. But it seems like the wound from the last battle has not healed yet, so Dixie and Kiddy were given the task instead. Like the second release ever made, you will control the two Kongs to defeat the enemies scattered in the level. Meanwhile, do not forget to collect the falling bananas along the way. Others are more special, requiring players to climb to search for particular items, and sometimes this leads to a boss fight. It is not really difficult to pass the challenge if there is a good enough control technique. Use the punch or the ability to pick up and throw stones to damage them. If unlucky, one of the two heroes is defeated, then you still have a chance with the other one. However, be extra careful, use some collected health potions to recover when your characters become weak.

title: DOOM
description: The existence of aliens is one of the things that people have always doubted about and even fear of aggression from them. And that actually happened when a group of aliens used flying objects as well as brought some heavy weapons to attack the Earth. They were annihilated shortly afterward, but no one knew whether this danger had actually ended or not? Sometime later, several messages warning the return of aliens again had been sent to Earth. Scientists had identified the location, which is from Mars. A plan to eradicate these dangers was devised as an agent was chosen to carry out this noble mission!

title: Danny Phantom: The Ultimate Enemy
description: The story began with the Amity Park city event. For many years, when the forces of darkness destroyed the Earth, this city was protected by the Damon Gray father and son with a shield. But until recently, there seemed to be a threat coming from inside, causing the Ghosh Shield to appear holes. In an attempt to combat the invading ghosts, Valerie was attacked by Knight Fright and warned that his master would soon destroy the place. After investigations from the reconnaissance team, the Dark Danny Phantom is the threat that Fright mentioned. This is the evil version of the young hero Danny. No one will be able to destroy and stop Danny’s evil plans, but himself.

title: Digimon Battle Spirit
description: The story of DIGIMON BATTLE SPIRIT takes place in a dark corner of the Digit World digital world, when everything is welcome here, even monsters. However, it wasn’t really that peaceful, when the chaos along with the wrath of the devil had appeared with the ultimate goal of invading this land. Evil spirits are born, they possess the body of monsters called “Digimon” (short for Digit Monster). With a deeper purpose of occupying other planets in the universe. Evil spirits are constantly growing, becoming more cruel and brutal when they are ready to destroy fellow humans or any living creatures, or anything else that doesn’t obey to be a part of this plan. Fortunately, there are some Digimon that still maintain their inherent good nature, and always ready to fight against the evil ones. The only way to banish evil spirits is to defeat the part of Digimon, which is being possessed. The last hope for the peace of the universe still exist, but will it be successful?

title: Donkey Kong Country
description: Bananas have always been a nutritious source of food for Kongs. In the process of training for the young kids on the island, it provides a lot of energy. Bananas are long and scarce fruit when the weather gets colder, so, Kongs need to store a large number of bananas before entering the winter. On a stormy night, everyone stopped practicing and went home to rest. Donkey Kong assigned the task of guarding the stockpile to Diddy Kong as well as patrolling around the island to ensure the race members had a good night’s sleep. Unfortunately, the Kremlings brought his accomplices in, stole all of the bananas, and then locked Diddy Kong into a crate. The next morning, Donkey Kong returned and found out. He immediately set out to search for the Kremlings, based on the bananas he dropped on the run.

title: Donkey Kong Country 2
description: Kaptain K. Rool has once associated with Kremling to steal the whole bananas storage on the island of Donkey Kong. But their plan was totally failed, and the result is that they were beaten up badly. The hatred has grown that once again, they come back for revenge. One night, when Donkey Kong was sitting at the shore to enjoy the atmosphere, suddenly Kaptain K. Rool appeared and kidnapped him. The next morning, Diddy and Dixie Kong realized the incident after finding the footprints left by the enemy, along with a message: “Exchanging bananas for the friend’s safety.” Enraged by this action, Diddy and Dixie decide to make a journey to rescue the island’s leader as well as defeat the enemy, once and for all.

title: Donkey Kong – King of Swing
description: Every ten years, the Jungle Jam tournament is held to search for the hero of the green jungle. The rules are rigorously set to ensure fairness, transparency, and no individual retaliation. King K. Rool is a crafty person. He knew that if he obeyed the rules, he would not be able to win the championship. Therefore, he stole the Golden Cup, then fled and declared himself the strongest. The organizers, including Cranky Kong, are extremely angry because this is a tournament that all the members of the forest have looked forward to and about to take place, so there must not be any mistake. Donkey Kong was given the task to take home the precious prize for the champion before things went wrong, and the forest fell into chaos.
releaseDate:
EU: February 4, 2005
AU: March 16, 2005
JP: May 19, 2005
NA: September 19, 2005

title: Double Dragon Advance
description: DOUBLE DRAGON ADVANCE sets the scene in New York City when crimes are spreading everywhere. The life of the residents here has been unbalanced by the activities of a gang called Shadow. Twins Billy and Jimmy Lee are running a gym to teach the people of Kung Fu, so they can protect themselves in case of danger. But Shadow took this into consideration and abducted Jimmy’s girlfriend. Later, they sent a message to ask him to hand over the martial arts secret book Sou-Setsu-Ken and leave the gym in exchange for Marian’s freedom. Jimmy understood that the city would be in more danger if the gang got those powerful secrets, but either he did not want his girlfriend to be harmed. Therefore, the two brothers joined together and planned to destroy the leaders of shadow warriors to end the dark period that New York is suffering.

title: Dragon Ball Z – Taiketsu
description: DRAGONBALL Z – TAIKETSU is a fighting game, which is quite similar to the famous Street Fight that was previously released. Basically, its control mechanism is quite simple, in which players will take the role of a character to take part in 1vs1 matches. The player can choose Goku, Vegeta, Krillin, or even villains characters like Buu and Broly. Each character will include basic fighting skills, for instance, are punches, kicks, or more painful rotating kicks. Of course, they also have special skills and surely everyone who has seen Anime will understand this. Goku can evolve into Super Saiyan 1 and 2 forms, or his signature Kamehameha. The powerful Final Flash damage attack of Prince Vegeta or the Majin Buu’s Chocolate Beam used to make many Saiyan heroes suffer. However, these techniques will consume Ki resources, represented by the third status bar at the top of the screen. During the battle, Ki will automatically increase when the character is trying to load or in a resting state.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Advanced Adventure
description: This mode revolves around the Son Goku artifact, which makes up the majority of this game. Its story almost rebuilds the entire content of the Dragon Ball Anime series, when Goku was a child. Every important event in his life is perfectly recreated, including the first meeting with Bulma, Master Roshi, King Picolo until defeating the Red Ribbon army to protect the Earth. After that, it was the event to search for dragon balls with his friends: Bulma, Yamcha, Uron and other friends in his childhood. Each of the NPC missions that players meet on the way will lead to the whole story and expose everything. At the early levels, when Goku was young, he did not have much strength and special skills, so he can only fight with weak monsters. As he reaches a higher level, he will unlock new maps, with strong enemies and even bosses, including future friends and some villains.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Supersonic Warriors
description: The Supersonic Warriors tournament was held on Earth, attracting Son Goku’s friends and three villains: The Cell, Buu and Frieza Sagas. Players can choose to take the role of different characters such as Goku, Gohan, Krillin, Vegeta, Android 18,… and experience the battle in the same order as in the original Dragon Ball Manga. Although the game does not build a specific scenario, each character will also have a separate story to explore. If the player becomes a Goku, the first battles in Supersonic Warriors will be with friends like Trunks, Android 17, or someone else. Then, occur with the first villain, The Cell, Freiza Sagas, and finally is Buu. Meanwhile, Vegeta’s story takes place with Freiza first and Krillin ends with the event of marrying Android 18 after giving birth to a child.
releaseDate:
JP: March 26, 2004
NA: June 22, 2004
EU: August 22, 2004

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku
description: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku is an RPG, adventure and action game. The game is inspired by the famous movie and cartoon series, Dragon Ball Z. With the plot centered around the main character, Goku, along an adventure journey through his planets. When the planet Namek was destroyed, only Goku survived but he was exhausted and became very weak. In order to become strong as before, Goku will have to go through different stages of recovery by participating in battles and winning. The match will be scattered in different planets like Namek or earth. In addition to fighting, you will have to complete the tasks assigned to gain experience and level up. In the final stage, when Goku level up and becomes Super Saiyan he will have to confront Frieza – the universal emperor. Goku will have to defeat the evil Frieza to bring safety to the people of the earth.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku II
description: After defeating the villain Frieza Sagas, the protection of the planet Namek ends, and the warriors return to Earth to rest. It seems like the evil has ended, but this thought was suppressed by Dr. Gero when bringing two destroyers, Android 17 and Android 18. They were introduced as two half-robot warriors, capable of combat ability without fatigue, and extremely intelligent in tactical plans.

title: Dungeons And Dragons – Eye Of The Beholder
description: Waterdeep is a peaceful city, but many mysterious events have occurred recently, which made the lords become worried. Khelben Arunun made this clear when he went to Calimshan and Amn to find out. As a matter of fact, all of the evidence has shown that the threat is targeting Waterdeep, and soon it will really expose. Sometime later, a team of adventurers was tasked with venturing into the underground to search for the cause. They found a suspect and were revealed about the plan to destroy this kingdom. In it, the leader is Xanathar, also known as the crime lord.

title: F-Zero: GP Legend
description: Compared to the previous release in the Series, F-Zero GP Legend owns the storyline and the original character set in the movie. With the primary mode, it has the corresponding role as an all-game championship tournament. Clear hierarchical ladder model, you must turn and defeat opponents in order to progress deeper into the inner rounds, while the difficulty is continuously increasing. Every time you win, the system will reward monetary units that can be used to unlock racing cars and characters. In total, there are 29 choices, corresponding to familiar characters such as Rick Wheeler, Octoman, Samurai Goroh, or Captain Falcon. Each of them has each unique special ability to impact the different effects of the vehicle. Some slow down the speed but really stabilize all the way. Others are moving at high speeds, but the low friction causes the risk of turning accidents. In addition, there are some other modes that will be able to bring new experiences that you should try. It includes Changellen, Zero tests, Training, Gran Prix, and Time Attack.

title: Fantastic 4
description: Fantastic Four is about four different citizens of the United States, connected with each other through special abilities. Before the heroic squad was formed, Ben was a product of Genetically modified experiments. He was often agitated to become aggressive and could destroy everything in the city. Behind that was an unprecedented cruel man who took control of his mind and body. But after meeting three teammates, Ben can control himself now. This makes that person carry out another plan, in which an army of monsters through a large meteorite is brought. More than just an ordinary big stone, it was also a huge source of energy that Diablo aspired to perfect his plan to conquer the world.

title: Final Fantasy I & II: Dawn of Souls
description: Earth, fire, water, and wind are the four elements of infinite power, and it is their state that defines the world in which humans live. Once the state of the four elements is changed, the world will be affected as well. About 400 years ago, the Lefeinish race used the power of the Wind to build a floating castle on a space station and create a wind monster, which was the starting point for all subsequent threats. 200 years later, the imbalance began to affect, when the water element also became darker, which led to the appearance of water monsters. Finally, the earth and fire elements were also infected with dark powers that created two corresponding monsters. They tried to destroy the world with natural disasters, and bring countless monsters to massacre the people here. At that moment of darkness, four warriors of light appeared and brought hope to rescue people from these sufferings as well as to give them a better life.

title: Final Fantasy Tactics Advance
description: The story of the Final Fantasy Tactics Advance revolves around the protagonist Marche Radiuju, as he struggles against his friends’ dreams. Those are Cid Randell, Donate Radiuju, Mewt Randell, and Ritz Malheur. In real life, they always have weaknesses and that makes themselves not really confident. Therefore, they all together dream of a better and more beautiful world called Ivalice, where there is no more unhappiness, as well as their shortcomings, are compensated. Once accidentally, Mewt goes to a bookstore and discovers an old book called Gran Grimoire. It is written in an old language and he thinks Marche can neutralize it. Immediately, Mewt goes to Marche’s house to find out. However, what he gets back is just the ignorance of his friend, because he isn’t really interested in it. The next morning, Marche wakes up and realizes he has lived in Ivalice, the dream world where his friends have a better life. But, their negative emotions also create a clone, acting as brutal villains. Besides trying to get rid of Ivalice, he must eliminate these negative emotions to protect his friends.

title: Final Fantasy V Advance
description: Strange events started to take place in the kingdom of King Tycoon when the winds began to stop blowing as well as the sun was obscured, creating an unprecedented murky scene. Princess Lenna warned him about a serious danger that was lurking and needed an investigation to clarify. Shortly after that, a trip to the Wind Shrine was made, and the first scene he saw was the shattering of one of those four elemental crystals. Lena discovered her father didn’t return after the trip, so she went to the temple to find out what exactly did happen. On the journey, she meets Galuf and Bartz, two boys, who share the same purpose. But then, unfortunately, the three of them are attacked by a horde of monsters, along with a warning about a man named Exdeath returning. Upon reaching the Wind Shrine, Tycoon’s image appears and explains about the name Exdeath, who is an old warlock, trying to destroy crystals to release dark energy and immerse the entire world in death.

title: Final Fantasy VI Advance
description: Thousands of years ago, a conflict called “War of the Magic” took place. The three “Warring Triad” entities have captured humans and turned them into favorable phantom creatures called the Espers to become slaves and to serve their wars. Later, they realized that the cruelty had been done to humans, so the wars were stopped. At the same time, they sealed themselves in the rocks and gave the Esper creatures magical powers. Thousands of years later, when Emperor Gestahl appeared and brought his army with the aim of world domination, he found three stone statues and harnessed the power of the Espers with the aim of creating a perfect weapon, a combination of technology and magic. But one thing he did not expect was his general Kefka. Kefka killed him and took control of the entire empire. He wants to merge the power of three statues into his body to destroy the world, with the power as a god. Luckily, at a time when the world was in danger, an army called The Returners appeared, and they vowed to resist Kefka’s evil plot.

title: Final Fight One
description: Peace and happiness are things that people should inherit, but at Metro, it is considered as something so luxurious that people can’t look for. For a long time, criminal gangs have flourished. They operate openly and are willing to use violence against anyone who discourages them. Until Mike Haggar appeared, he vowed to wipe out the criminals so that the residents could escape from the situation of fear. Mad Gear Gang – a group of underground operators at Metro already know this. They have planned to kidnap Jessica and warn the hero that he must close his eyes to ignore the organization’s criminal activities if not want something terrible to happen to his own daughter. Haggar informed his wife Guy and son-in-law Cody of the bad things that had happened. They decided to fight together for justice as well as to rescue little Jessica.

title: Finding Nemo
description: Sony Computer Entertainment America has landed on the GBA platform. Their products are considered to be intended for children, as evidenced by Ghosts and Goblins. It has no elements of intellectual exploitation nor the plot that goes deep into the character’s interior. But it seems “Finding Nemo” has redefined some of these aspects. Its level designs are quite good and clever enough as well as very challenging, of those everyone needs in a Platforming. Completely built in the sea, you take on the role of a clownfish looking for the lost son Nemo. This journey extends throughout the world, with enormous dangers that are inevitable. Dory and Marlin are the only two characters that can be picked for playing. They have good abilities to cope with all the difficulties encountered along the way, which you can learn and master through the training phase at the start of this game.

title: Fire Emblem
description: The Fire Emblem is set in an ancient era when the kingdoms were constantly in conflict. This leads to the creation of endless wars, leaving the world in turmoil. The story begins with two characters Chrom and his close friend, Robin. They fought together against the Validar race of the neighboring kingdom. After the battle, they won, but Chorm’s friend was hit by an arrow that had been cursed by the last champion of Validar. Since then, Robin has lost his memories and acted in a very mysterious way. Frederick, a general under Chorm, had always been preoccupied with this and was sometimes suspicious. While the war with the Plegian nation was taking place, Chorm, his sisters Lissa and Frederick were attacked by an army of corpses. Fortunately, a mysterious character named Marth along with the army of appeared and rescued. Before leaving, he left a warning that this was just the beginning of a big battle that was about to take place. What is that battle? And will Robin be involved in?

title: Fire Emblem: The Sacred Echoes
description: Sacred Echoes is a demake of Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia for the GBA. The complete patch includes all of Shadows of Valentia’s 5 story acts, with 46 story maps, 1 gaiden chapter, and 8 repeatable maps. Hack Features: • The Gaiden/Echoes magic system, where spells are learned by level-up, are accessible through the B.Magic or W.Magic menu, and cost HP to cast. • Various mechanics tweaks to mirror Echoes and Gaiden’s combat system, including the EXP formula. • Different maps and objectives from the source games. • Weapon Triangle applies to equippable weapons and can be one-sided. Think carefully about how to approach WTA and WTD! • Branching promotions for the Villager classes, with 5 possible class options for each. (Faye now has access to the Archer line.) • 3rd tier classes, with expanded caps allowing stats to reach 40. The dread fighter → villager loop is also included. Female sages can now promote into female dread fighters and take part in the loop as well. • A functional world map that can be explored, just like in the originals. • Still CGs adapted from Echoes • Additional units to fill gaps in the Echoes roster (a Thief and an axe user) • Sacred Springs allowing units to gain experience, stat boosts, or even revive dead units. • Casual/Classic mode split. • All-new GBA remixes of Gaiden and Echoes soundtrack. • Various UI improvements. • Available in both English and Spanish.

title: Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones
description: Thousands of years ago, when monsters appeared on the Magvel continent and threatened the lives of the people in the six kingdoms, the gods appeared and used five magical tones called Sacred Stones to destroy them and seal the soul of the demon king Fomortiis. From then on, the nation lived in peace and flourished. However, when greed and power invaded the mind, one of the six kingdoms used the “Sacred Stones” to invade its neighbors. Renais suffered attacks from the powerful Grado empire, causing many people to be killed as well as the Eirika and Ephraim twins separated. While Ephraim tried to fight against the enemy from the South, Eirika went to seek support from neighboring countries. Soon after, she discovered that the demon lord Fomortiis had been reborn, and once again, Magvel was in war with the extremely savage monsters.

title: Game Boy Advance Video: Pokémon: Volume 1
description: Pokémon GBA Video: For Ho-Oh The Bells Toll!/Hot Water Battle is a collection of two great Pokémon episodes you can watch on your Game Boy Advance. Enjoy skip-free viewing while you travel – the screen will never jump or skip, no matter how much you move your GBA around. No additional hardware or attachments are required — just your GBA!

title: Golden Sun
description: Three years ago, a huge snowstorm occurred during the night. This puts the people of Vale village in danger as the village is located right at the foot of the mountain. The elders tried to stop the rocks rolling towards Vale, but some ill-fated people did not pass. The people there were all chaos. When everyone was trying to evacuate to a safer place, Isaac’s family was lost to each other. A few moments later, Isaac met his two old friends, Garet and Jenna. He asked his friends for help to find his family, in return, he would accompany them in the Psynergy’s research project by Dr. Kraden. As an incident, the three of them were lost in the Sol Sanctum area, where Elemental Stars entities existed. By chance, they learned that Jenna and Kraden had been kidnapped here, and these strangers even intended to attack all of the three. Luckily, Wise One appeared right at that time to rescue them, then showed them that the only way to save their families as well as to escape from there is to return the Elemental Stars entities to sealed state.

title: Golden Sun: The Lost Age
description: Golden Sun – The Lost Age is set in a world called Weyard, where there are 4 lighthouses that sustain the life of every resident here. A long ago, villains like Saturdayos and Menardi were annihilated, but it seemed that a new danger appeared when all of these four lighthouses were extinguished, causing Weyard to be immersed in darkness. All living creatures are dying when monsters appear everywhere. Alex, Jenna, Kraden, and Felix try to fight the dangers and light up two lighthouses. However, the remaining two tops seem to have lost their sustained energy. While they are affording to search for it, Alex has been missing, and the secret of the last villain has not been revealed yet. Jenna, Kraden, and Felix have a harder time, but they swear to each other that they must save Weyard and find their close friend.

title: Grand Theft Auto Advance
description: Grand Theft Auto Advance is the 7th part in the Grand Theft Auto saga series released by Rockstar Games on GBA. The context of this game takes place in Liberty City, revolves around the character Mike – a criminal who is working for Vinnie. Previously, Mike was a homeless child, Vinnie adopted and gave him a good life, although he often had to do illegal work. As growing up, Mike realized that the nature of these jobs is not good at all, so he decided to leave Liberty with Vinnie to start a better life. However, they did not have much money, so they decided to meet the Mafia boss to make a final mission before giving up all. However, a problem occurred during work. Vinnie was murdered and the culprit took away all of the money from them, which they had accumulated for years. Too painful after the loss of his second father, Mike decided to stay in Liberty to find and avenge the murderer, and he also separated from the gang of Mafia to work individually.

title: Gunstar Super Heroes
description: The Golden Silver, also known as God of Ruin, is the threat of Planet 9. For years, he has taken many lives and destroyed plenty of peaceful countrysides. Gunstar’s ancestor “Dynasty” was promptly stopped it from the risk of being disappeared forever. He used four Mystical stones to imprison the souls of the destroyer as well as to keep the citizens peaceful. It seems like everything has ended completely, but in these lately years, the G9 is once again in danger of extinction. Colonel Red – a dictator, appeared and took four Mystical stones to revive the Golden Silver. Green accidentally became involved in this incident, because she was hypnotized and obeyed the bad guys’ requests. Will Red, the last hope, be able to save his sister and end the recurring troubles?

title: Hamtaro: Ham Ham Heartbreak
description: As the title of the game, it has a sad story caused by Spat – a hamster. Since arriving in the Hamster world, he has disrupted the happiness of many mouse couples and caused them to sink into suffering. Hamtaro had always been mindful of this and decided he needed to do something to bring things back to equilibrium. You will take the role of him, fight for about 20 hours to bring happiness to everyone. Like most other RPGs, combat, interaction, and items are the main features that players will explore. However, there are not too many scenes of battles, as this will bring chaos. Maybe you know how shy mice are. Instead of trying to cause a pitiful death for Spat, following and dealing with the suffering he left would be a better choice. Although it was quite tiring, when the wicked person passed through the kingdom, everything would end smoothly. As I mentioned, the task is simply to interact with the victims and try not to let them lose the other half. It is quite simple and offers many interesting things to enjoy.
releaseDate:
JP: May 3, 2002
NA: April 8, 2003
EU: June 27, 2003

title: Harvest Moon: Friends of Mineral Town
description: Tom is a 12-year-old boy, he lives in the city with his parents. During the summer holidays, their family traveled together in Mineral Town and that was probably the most memorable memory of his life. As a naughty boy, Tom himself went around the places in Mineral Town and got lost to an old man’s farm. The old man contacted his parents to bring him home. Before leaving, he left Tom’s address and told him to keep in touch regularly. For a long time, Tom didn’t receive any letters from the old man, which made him feel a bit worried, so he decided to visit the farm and find out what happened. Unfortunately, the Old Man died and asked the mayor to send a will which is about leaving Tom his farm. To grieve for his old friend, he decided to stay here and continue to build his unfinished career.

title: Harvest Moon: More Friends of Mineral Town
description: “Harvest Moon: More Friends of Mineral Town” revolves around the story of a girl named Lily. This year, she is 20 years old. She lives in a rather cramped apartment and has an unsuitable job. She has long dreamed of living a peaceful life on a small farm, growing trees, raising animals, and making her favorite food. Then one day, she reads the news that someone wanted to sell a farm to start a new life in the city. Seizing the opportunity, Lily decides to buy the farm to start fulfilling her dream and building a new career. But on the first day of visiting the farm, a sad sight appears right in front of her eyes, when almost everything was broken and so old. Reconstructing this place will probably be hard, and require much help from the player.

title: Justice League Heroes: The Flash
description: “Justice League Heroes: The Flash” plot is quite fragmented, and is divided into three different chapters. In the beginning, Gorilla Grodd built an army of robots to destroy the city of Keystone. But Martian Manhunter detected it early and soon informed it to Flash to stop it. Fortunately, only one part of the plan has been implemented, so the opportunity to keep the peace for people still exists. Then the second event occurred when STAR Labs was hacked. Someone had tried to steal data, and secret projects were being researching. Super Man and Batman have successfully detected and protected data. Together they investigated to find the actual operator, but what it brought was an attack on Gotham City. They understood that this was just a trick to cause distraction, so assigned Flash to solve the recurring problems, while continuing their work. In the last part, Wonder Woman’s homeland was destroyed by the witch Circe. She planted a spell of wormwood that made people turn into animals.
releaseDate:
NA: October 17, 2006
EU: November 24, 2006
AU: December 5, 2006

title: Kirby & the Amazing Mirror
description: The story of Kirby & The Amazing Mirror begins when the beautiful land of Dreamland is connected to another world through a magic mirror placed in the sky. In the mirror world, a golden mirror is said to make all of the human dreams come true through reflection. However, someone has created an impact and made the golden mirror-reversed, causing extremely evil copies. After having discovered this serious problem, the Meta Knight himself flew into the mirror world to fix them. But it seems that this will only get worse when he accidentally creates another evil “Dark Meta Knight” clone. The evil-Meta flew down to Dreamland and came across Kirby.

title: Kirby Nightmare in Dreamland
description: Dream Land is a beautiful and peaceful land. Here, the fountain Fountain of Dreams collects the hopes and dreams of every citizen to make it come true while giving them beautiful dreams after a hard-working day. But one day, a tragedy happened to the kingdom when King DeDeDe destroyed the Star Rod – the fountain’s energy and caused it to stop working while the Star Rod broke into small pieces. Immediately after that incident, Kirby fought the one who destroyed the good things that were protecting the kingdom and restored Star Rod. However, soon after the Fountain of Dreams resumed work, Nightmare appeared and brought bad things to everyone. The only thing Dream Land could return to being a peaceful kingdom was to defeat the Nightmare and the terrible things it brought about. Kirby, along with the hopes of the people in the kingdom, will make this dangerous journey, can he win and return?

title: MEGA MAN BATTLE NETWORK 5 – TEAM COLONEL
description:
The battle for the 4th release has not yet ended yet. Although WWW has failed miserably after the launch, the trump card has not really shown. Marking the return, the evil organization brings unprecedented threats. These are called “TEAM COLONEL.” Lan soon received warnings and prepared for Mega Man. In terms of gameplay, it has many aspects to exploit, including interaction and fights with bad Navis (viruses). A robust innovation that you can see right from the start of the battle is its mechanism of action. The battlefield is still taking place on the 6×3 grid, but instead of taking turns as the previous versions, it has become more flexible. You can move freely in real-time and use techniques to attack. Of course, enemies can do the same thing to you. Even if you’re a fastidious person, I think you would still give it 8/10 points.
After each victory, there will be rewards. These include currency units and chip fragments, which can replicate complete chips. In some ways, they play an essential role because of the direct influence on the character.

title: MIDNIGHT CLUB STREET RACING
description:
Previously, when collaborating with Microsoft, Angel Studios released Midtown Madness debut, but it is not really a big leap in their career. Later, when developing “Midnight Club: Street Racing” with “Rockstar Games,” the situation changed a lot. Obviously, you may notice this game has been affected in part by GTA. You own a racing car and then use it to perform the target chase missions. It’s quite simple and feels very familiar. The only strange thing is its plot, which tells the turning point in the life of a taxi driver. When trying to make a living at night, you meet a racing club and accidentally become a Hookmen. With coverage from New York to London, there are many exciting places and paths to explore. However, the more flashy the scene, the more challenging it becomes. From dark streets to places filled with lights, casino and a variety of vehicles, will all hinder your task. Although there are many ways to go, sometimes mistakes will bring failure.
There are also some other options if you want to change and experience new things. These include: Arcade, Capture the Flag, and Two-players mode.

title: Madagascar
description: Dreamworks Animation is famous for the funny cartoon series called MADAGASCAR. And even when this edition was published on GBA, its echo did not show signs of decline. What is the reason? It must be because of the attractive elements, for those watching this show have also been simulated quite well in the action platform game. To illustrate this, you’ll find that Alex can use his fragrant breath as a poison to deal damage to his enemies, while Gloria pig makes use of his round body to roll and crush the unwanted. With exactly the original character series from the movie, you will use their unique abilities to pass 13 levels. In each part, the idea is made clear, requiring players to achieve a specific goal if you want to move to another new area. It could be collecting plants, or simply defeating a few other animals attempting to attack the island.

title: Mario & Luigi – Superstar Saga
description: The story of Mario & Luigi Superstar Saga begins with the event of Princess Peach’s voice being stolen by a witch named Cackletta. Receiving a plea for help, Mario and Luigi went to Bowser, but he wasn’t the one who did this bad thing. They later traveled to the Beanbean Kingdom and were told by the queen that Cackletta had done this, with the aim of turning Princess Peach into a ruiner by replacing her voice with gunpowder. Prince Peasley tried to stop this but unfortunately was turned into a dragon by the witch’s magic. If Mario and Luigi can defeat Peasley, he will return to being human and guide them to Woohoo Hooniversity.

title: Mario Golf: Advance Tour
description: Neil and Ella are students at the World Golf Academy. During the summer vacation, they joined a Club at Marion Country to look for new experiences. They were drawn by Mario into a championship tournament there. The only way to return home is to defeat the opponents to win the Gold Cup.

title: Mario Kart: Super Circuit
description: In general, the gameplay of Mario Kart: Super Circuit is not much different from its predecessive versions. In each race, the player will try to race from 3 to 5 laps as well as to maintain the speed of his or her car to finish first. The maps of the game are really diverse with quite a lot of obstacles. So if you want to achieve the championship trophy, you have to control your car skillfully and handle movements to avoid being thrown off the track. In addition, it also has a lot of special items giving advantages to support players on the track, such as speeding up in just a short time, or some items that are detrimental to other opponents.
releaseDate:
JP: July 21, 2001
NA: August 27, 2001
EU: September 14, 2001

title: Mario Party Advance
description: Mario, Luigi, Peach, and Yoshi have been invited by Toad to join the biggest party at Party World. In here, people can pause all the tired battles to start enjoying good food and entertaining Minigames. Too bad, Bowsew learned that he was not invited, so he became angry and decided to ruin everything. The sky suddenly darkened when Bowser appeared with his subordinate Koopa Kid and ruined all of Toad’s previous preparations. That is what has made the Minigame and Gaddgets scattered everywhere. Now all 4 of Mario, Luigi, Peach, and Yoshi will have to collect them all before the party really starts.

title: Mario Tennis: Power Tour
description: Alex is a student at the Royal Tennis Academy, who had trained to participate in the world championship tournament. A strange event happened, as a group of strangers came to the academy and defeated the best students, and showed their amazing skills in a single match. Alex felt this was an insult that he decided to find the masked person behind this group. He participated in tournaments for Junior, Senior, and surpassed most of the opponents, but the stranger still does not appear. There only one chance, when he passes the level of Varsity and proceeds to The Island Open tournament in the Mushroom kingdom.
releaseDate:
JP: September 13, 2005
EU: November 18, 2005
AU: December 1, 2005
NA: December 5, 2005

title: Mario Vs. Donkey Kong
description: Donkey Kong is a person with a good nature, but he is always jealous of the successes of others. One time, when he was watching TV, he saw Mario’s advertising of selling Mini toys. Shortly thereafter, a plan to steal the Mini toys was created, and made in the night. Unfortunately, Mario discovered this friend’s bad deeds and promptly stopped. However, not because of that Donkey Kong gave up. He became angrier that he kidnapped the people of the city to request a trade with Mario, otherwise they would be in danger. Mario must travel through 6 worlds to rescue innocent residents as well as make his friend alter to eliminate his evil personalities.
releaseDate:
NA: May 24, 2004
JP: June 10, 2004
EU: November 19, 2004
AU: 2004

title: Medabots Metabee
description: Medabots is a robot that uses artificial intelligence. They are produced for the purpose of serving people in jobs. There are even many Medabots tournaments held, as a form of entertainment for humans, and attract extremely powerful warriors. Ikki Tenryō, a young boy who dreams of becoming a champion in the World Robattle tournament. However, his father did not support this and with the small amount of money he had accumulated for so long, it was not enough. Luckily, on a trip to the river, he picked up a medal and later bought a Medabot called Metabee. He has a special ability called Medaforce, but with a weak appearance, Ikki Tenryō has not realized it yet. Metabee’s mysterious potential will gradually be revealed on the next journey to the top of glory.
releaseDate:
JP: December 25, 2002
EU: November 22, 2002
NA: March 31, 2003
JP: April 18, 2003

title: Mega Man & Bass
description: After the 8th event had ended with the defeat of Dr. Wily and Dr. Light, they tried to rebuild a new castle along with the purpose of revenging. But unfortunately, when the new robot technology database is about to be completed, an artificial intelligence named King appears and steals all of the results. And before fleeing, he announced a plan to rule the world with modern technology, or clearer, it’s about robots replacing humans. Bass, who calls himself the strongest and most intelligent that Wily has ever created, has become angry. He was chasing King but was prevented by an army created by King from the data warehouse. Dr. Light reached out to Mega Man about the awful things which have been going on as well as proposed a plan to stop them, including Bass’s cooperation.
releaseDate:
JP: August 10, 2002
NA: March 11, 2003
PAL: March 31, 2003

title: Mega Man Battle Network
description: In the future, robots will have become saturated and not really a danger anymore. Instead, cyberspace is going to be a place that contains many mysterious things. In which, the Cybercrime organizations will use artificial intelligence to dominate the world. They can travel around the physical network and create malicious viruses to destroy or steal human workings. The head of this criminal chain is Wily. He has teamed up with another organization called WWW to commit crimes. Having foretold of these dangers, Dr. Tadashi Hikari develops another program to protect humans from attacks of viruses. NetNavi artificial intelligence was created, which is capable of fighting and using PET’s weapons, through the BattleChips.

title: Mega Man Battle Network 4 Red Sun
description: After much effort against the evil coming from the nest In WWW, Lan realized that they would never really end if the leaders still existed. With help from the Navis Mega Man assistant. Lan is planning to find the exact location where the villains are hiding. Recognizing this danger, WWW strengthened its forces to fight against Lan. One thing is clear, Lan is having many troubles, and you need to remove them one by one. But how? Play as a Mega hero and travel in the cyber world. Of course, there are many clashes with viruses, but thanks to the dedicated chips provided by Lan, you will be able to use many capabilities to destroy anything in the way. They are programmed for a specific activity, such as increasing defenses, strength, restoring vitality, or helping Navis learn a new skill. All battles take place on a 6×3 grid and are organized in turn. It’s pretty simple to grasp, but a tactical issue is really the key to winning.
releaseDate:
JP: December 12, 2003
NA: June 29, 2004
PAL: September 3, 2004

title: Mega Man Battle Network 5 – Team Protoman
description: Yuichiro – Lan Hikari’s father is researching a science project for SciLab. But unfortunately, it was stolen, and even the PET program is no longer available. After preliminary investigations, all evidence was directed to Dr. Regal and the Nebula organized by him. Yuichiro said that once the project’s code is broken, bad guys will be able to take advantage of the Dark Chips to gain control of computer systems around the world. If this worry becomes a reality, it will cause chaos and possibly the war between nations. Lan, with the help of her father, is planning to stop the threat.

title: Mega Man Battle Network 6 Cybeast Falzar
description: After the mess coming from the battle with WWW in the 5th version, Lan and her family moved to the digital city to start a new life. But it didn’t take long. The wind and waves have struck again. Megaman recognized the first signs, and he began to investigate secretly. As expected, WWW has not given up on conquering the world yet. Cybeasts Falzar and Gregar directly involved and implemented the plan that the villain brought. They were installed into the system of two giant Copybots, and equipped with state-of-the-art weapons. In the worst case, it will be deployed to destroy both the Net and the Earth. Meanwhile, assistant Iris was aware that the human world is not a bad thing to eliminate, so he joined with Lan and Mega Man to prevent the imminent danger.

title: Mega Man Zero 2
description: Since the last time he defeated Copy X, Zero Man has started a new battle with the army of the Pantheons in the harsh desert. When the war ended, he was stuck in a sandstorm. Fortunately, he can still survive, but the armor was heavily damaged as he was pursued by the Neo Arcadia army. At that critical moment, Harpuia – one of the surviving members of the Four Guardians had promptly appeared to rescue him. However, a massacre is about to take place when Elpizo is trying to harness the power of the Dark Elf. His purpose is to release the bad energy, strengthen his army, and kill the last warriors who are trying to protect the peace. A century ago, the Earth once fell into a catastrophic state by Dr. Weil while he was doing the same thing, but it was promptly stopped by a heroic force. But now, only Zero can do this.
releaseDate:
JP: May 2, 2003
NA: October 14, 2003
EU: October 31, 2003

title: Mega Man Zero 3
description: Since Copy X – the leader of the Neo Arcadia Empire is destroyed, people can enjoy a peaceful life. Ciel decided to cede the right to run Resistance to Elpizo. But he did not know that it was a big mistake when Elpizo have always wanted to possess the power of the Dark Elf. Shortly after that, he unleashed the world of black magic and death. The Dark Elf fled and returned with a giant creature of destruction named Omega, and Dr. Weil also led the rise of Neo Arcadia. Zero was awakened by Harpuia, the sage after a long sleep. Soonly, he grasped the situation and was told that the fastest and most effective way to end these threats is by searching for the Dark Elf and seal her once again.

title: Mega man Battle Network 6 Cybeast Gregar
description: The sixth part of the Series Battle Network began when Lan and his family were moving to Cyber ​​City to start a new life. Since the troubles at BN5, as well as the danger from the Dark Chips, are no longer exist, he wants to have a peaceful life, just simply going to school with his friends. However, WWW broke his plans, as they gradually returned with a worse plot. In the virtual world of cyberspace, MegaMan.EXE has found two dangers about Gregar Cybeasts Falzar. After investigating efforts, he discovered that the leader of the criminal organization of the third world is Wily, did created them, and put in 2 Copybots (ROBOT in real life) for the purpose of destroying the cyberspace as well as the human world. Perhaps, this will be the most brutal battle ever, and it ultimately determines the existence of Wily’s criminal organization – WWW, or the human world.
releaseDate:
JP: November 23, 2005
NA: June 13, 2006
EU: June 16, 2006

title: Metal Slug Advance
description: Morden is one of the most cruel generals in human history. Together with his army, he destroyed many peaceful cities and villages in order to show his dictatorship. Tyra Elson, a young girl lucky to survive the death sweep, but her relatives, friends, and family were massacred. Since that, the hatred in her blood grew and that motivated her to join the Peregrine Falcons organization with the ultimate goal of revenge. After years of training and undergoing extremely harsh training, little Tyra Elson has become one of the best mercenaries ever. Once on a mission in an unknown island, she accidentally met Walter Ryan, a cold guy and also is one of the most talented mercenaries of another unit in her organization. They became very close after that. Together with the pain of losing loved ones, they went together to take revenge on Morden, but that was not easy because his army was too crowded and powerful. With courage and excellent fighting skills, could the plan of retaliation for two steel warriors succeed?

title: Metroid Fusion
description: Samus Aran was sent to the lab on planet SR388 to find out what happened to the biological research team (BSL) after losing contact with them over a period of time. Upon arrival, the first thing he saw was a desolate space, and everyone seemed to have gone missing. He was about to search for clues, but suddenly a Hornoad appeared and tried to kill him with a weapon. Failed, Samus promptly reacted and destroyed him. Soon after, an amorphous creature called X Parasite invaded Samus’s body. His nervous system has been compromised, which results in loss of memory as well as loss control of many body organs. Luckily, he was able to endure. He returned home, had surgery and an immunization vaccine. The mystery going on at SR388 has not been revealed yet, where does the appearance of X Parasite come from? What is the purpose of the person behind this plot?

title: Metroid: Zero Mission
description: Metroid: Zero Mission is set in 2130 when Pirates Space launched an attack on the Gen Research Center on the planet SR388. They stole a sample called Metroids – a virus that can invade any living organism and drain its energy, then take control of the mind. Moreover, they can be cloned very quickly under the influence of Beta rays, making it even more dangerous than before. If Pirates Space has a bad purpose in using Metroids, an epidemic of the destruction of the galaxy is inevitable. Now, the only way to prevent this disaster from happening is to rob the Metroids and kill the infected living creatures. Samus Aran has been assigned this task, he will leave for the planet SR388.

title: Metroid: Zero Mission: Color Improvement Patch
description: The blown out and overly bright visuals of Metroid: Zero Mission, like those of many other games on the Game Boy Advance, do not fare well when viewed on modern monitors. Despite this, the game is one of the most beloved titles available for the Game Boy Advance. The sole purpose of this patch is to modify the color palettes in Metroid: Zero Mission in an effort to create a version of the game that is less taxing on the eyes and features a greater range of contrasts across the color spectrum. The desolate and solitary atmosphere of Super Metroid is the primary source of inspiration for this.

title: Moemon Devil 3RdX
description: Possessing cute animal girls on his squad instead of Pokemon, why not? Moemon Devil 3RdX + (Pokemon Fire Red Hack) is a hacked version created by a talented ROM hacker named “え び そ ば 氏”. Based on the original Pokemon Fire Red game, he (she) cleverly changed the image of cute Pokemon into beautiful, sexy girls with the name Moemon.

title: Mortal Kombat Advance
description: From the very beginning, the system provides players with a large number of characters, and this number goes up to 23. If you have a bit of interest in them, one thing can clearly see that they are designed is almost the same, both in appearance and combat skills evidenced by Scorpion (Golden Ninja), Classic Sub-Zero (Blue Ninja), Noob Saibot (Black Ninja) or Ermac (Purple Ninja). Although they also have special fighting abilities, it seems too weak to defeat the enemy, and most are not worth playing.

title: Mortal Kombat: Deadly Alliance
description: Raiden is one of the most powerful heroes in the Earthrealm continent. During the past 100 years, invasions in an arena called MORTAL KOMBAT had been prevented. But so far Raiden seems to be getting old, while threats still lurk around Earthrealm. Quan Chi and Shang Tsung are the two strong opponents they had once defeated, but now, they are planning to be returned with the dark magic power in order to revive the evil army for revenge. Once this happens, the continent will be completely destroyed. Facing with this peril, a conquest of the MORTAL KOMBAT arena is going to take place again, including the participation of Raiden and the heroes of Earthrealm. The strongest will have the right to determine the lives of others!

title: Mother 3
description: MOTHER 3 builds the scene after the end of EarthBound for many years. In Nowhere Islands, it is a very beautiful place, where the plants and animals thrive and bring a peaceful life to humans. However, the good things belong to this place are also the source of the bad things that are about to happen next. A bunch of monsters calling themselves “Pigmask” have landed on the island. Under the command of a tyrant named Porky Minch, he banished all residents and destroyed the vegetation to construct buildings, serving the development of technology. At that time, Lucas and his family went to the Nowhere Islands to visit his grandfather Alec. They noticed the structures being illegally built and the evacuation of residents to a remote area. They learned and grasped the story shortly thereafter. Too angry about this atrocity, Lucas decided to carry out a plan with his friends to expel the Pigmasks to the evil place they were born.

title: Namco Museum
description: In recognition of the great things that have contributed to the gaming industry, Namco has built a storage facility named Namco Museum. It consists of five major monuments: PAC-MAN, Galaxian, Dig Dug, Galaga, and Pole Position. In essence, this is only a part of the long-drawn series, aiming to provide a brief and more entertaining experience. They grow independently and depend on each person’s choice of the broadcast. Ms. PAC-MAN takes players into the maze, and with the Arcade genre, you will move around with the ultimate goal of eating all the dots and four ghosts to score high. It includes leaderboards, which are updated every time there is a breakthrough. Galaga has its own story when the planet you live in is at risk of being invaded by outer space enemies. Play as an astronaut, control your warship to battle destructive machines in the air, and not forget to avoid any collision. This style is reminiscent of Chicken Invaders that most people already know or have seen elsewhere, so it is not difficult to grasp this speed game.

title: Pac-Man World
description: On his 20th birthday, Pac-Man decided to return home to have a small party with his loved ones. But then, when the door opened, it was just a deserted space with not a single person. Everything was in disarray, and it looked like something terrible had happened here. With the evidence left, Pac-Man realized that his family was in danger with Toc Man – an evil man. He left a message that he was abducting everyone, including Baby Pac-Man, Jr. Pac-Man, Professor Pac-Man, and even the little dog. The only way to resolve this conflict is to join the final battle with Toc Man on the ghost island. The hero knows that the way to get there is not easy, and that guy could have arranged dangerous traps. But, there is no other way.

title: Pokemon Black & White Advanced
description: Pokemon Black & White Advanced (Pokemon Black & White Hack) is a remake of the original Pokemon Black & White game of hacker nicknamed Vytron. This section brings many new things to the player about both the storyline and the features in the game.

title: Pokemon Emerald Multiplayer
description: Bored with the same ol’ Pokemon experience? Enter Pokemon Emerald Multiplayer! Reviving the charm of the classic Pokemon Emerald but with a twist—now, you can pick from a staggering variety of starters and challenge your pals in a friendly Pokemon showdown. It’s time to get those competitive juices flowing!

title: Pokemon Fire Burn
description: The Pokemon Fire Burn (Pokemon Fire Red Hack) video game is a reimagining of the original Pokemon Fire Burn video game that was developed by a hacker ROM known by the alias Sakib66. When Kanto, Hoenn, Sinnoh, and Alola are all combined into one massive region, the storyline of the game remains the same. However, you will embark on an adventure in the biggest world that has ever existed. It stands to reason that the greater the land area, the greater the number and variety of Pokemon that must inhabit it. Throughout the course of the game, you will have the opportunity to catch Pokemon of all generations, from the first to the seventh. A significant number of adjustments have been made to the gameplay of the game, which is one of the ways in which it diverges from the game’s initial release.

title: Pokemon Fire Red
description: Before, in the 2000s, smartphones were something like a luxury that no one thought of. Therefore, there are no android games like now, the most popular are handheld games, for GBP. Pokemon – Fire Red seemed to dominate the GBP entertainment market at that time and it was an integral part of any GBP device. It was developed based on Nintendo’s franchising Pokemon brand, which is the most popular brand worldwide. Today, technology has made great strides, along with the advent of smart mobile devices. Games with sharp 3D graphics and new gameplay can easily be found, but it’s hard to replace the unique experiences that only the GBP system offers. In this article, we will learn about the product that once had a strong influence: Pokemon – Fire Red.

description: “Pokemon Hyper Emerald 807 English Patched (Pokemon Emerald Hack) ” is a remake of the original Pokemon Emerald version of an author group including Satochu, Poppy, and wwwww.

description: A hacker ROM with the alias Astraea created a very one-of-a-kind remake of Pokemon FireRed called Pokemon Johto League. The remake was based on the original version of Pokemon FireRed. The famous anime serves as inspiration for the storyline of the video game, and the events of the game take place at the conclusion of the anime, when Ash Ketchum is leaving the Orange Islands and heading back to Johto. As Ash, you will run into a wide variety of fascinating Pokemon, and you will be able to teach them moves to help you get ready for the upcoming battles.

title: Pokemon Mega
description: A hacker by the name of Ricardo created an extremely interesting remake of Pokemon Fire Red called Pokemon Mega (Pokemon Fire Red Hack). This remake was inspired by the original version of the game. The plot of the game has not been altered in any way, with the exception that the player will now face off against a well-known Ash character from the anime. Additionally, a new map has been included, which will present the player with a very different experience than before. In addition, Pokemon from Generations 1-7 can appear in a variety of forms, including the exclusive Mega Evolution variety. If you have been following the Pokemon series from the beginning, you won’t want to miss out on the opportunity to play this game.

title: Pokemon New FireRed
description: A ROM hacker by the name of Undi created a remake of Pokemon Fire Red titled “Pokemon New FireRed (Pokemon Fire Red Hack)”, which was based on the original version of Pokemon Fire Red. This game assures you that you will experience an entirely new adventure as well as fascinating shifts.

title: Pokemon Omega Ruby
description: A hacker who goes by the alias lucasfera15 created Pokemon Omega Ruby, also known as the Pokemon Ruby Hack. This game is a remake of the original Pokemon Ruby video game. The storyline of the game has not been altered from the original version; the only thing that has changed is the appearance of the Pokemon and how they have evolved.
