title: Pokemon Sun Sky and Moon Galaxy
description: Approximately 15 years have passed since the events of “Pokémon Trainer Red.” In the Kanto Region, the town of Pallet is where Red’s son resides. But Red suddenly vanished without a trace [However, Red does not actually play that significant of a role in the game]. The main character of the game who begins his journey at a time in Kanto when many things have been transformed completely. Brock becomes the Pokémon Professor after Professor Oak steps down from that position. There are some Pokémon that are not listed in the Kanto Pokedex that the protagonist runs into. At some point, he makes his way through the Alola Region! Kanto, however, serves as the setting for the majority of the game’s events.

title: Pokemon Ultra Red
description: Pokemon Ultra Red (Pokemon Fire Red Hack) is a mod version of the original Pokemon Fire Red and is owned by a ROM hacker. The nickname DarkFex created. The story of the game is still similar to other games in the series, you will become a young trainer in the training journey to win medals from the Gym Leaders then challenge the Elite Four to become the new champions. But the characters in this version are different from the original ones, and I will let you explore all the new things on your own.

title: Pokemon Ultra Shiny Gold Sigma
description: From the collaborative brilliance of the USGS team, including the dynamic duo Alex + Zel, comes an exhilarating take on a classic: Pokemon Ultra Shiny Gold Sigma. It’s not just a game; it’s a revamped universe where old meets new, creating a fusion that’s shinier than a freshly caught shiny Pikachu after a bath!

title: Pokemon X & Y GBA (Pokemon Emerald/Fire Red Hack)
description: If you’re looking to be charmed, intrigued, and occasionally baffled, then look no further than the bewitching universe of Pokemon X & Y GBA. This is not just a game—it’s a cultural phenomenon, a digital Garden of Eden where fantasy and statistics meet in a tantalizing tango. Buckle up, because we’re diving into six scientifically-proven reasons that make Pokemon X & Y GBA irresistibly engaging.

title: Pokémon Adventure: Red Chapter
description: Some games waltz into the limelight, sprinkle a bit of magic, and become instant legends. Among those ranks is the illustrious Pokemon Adventure Red Chapter. What’s the hubbub about, you ask? Let’s delve into the heart of the game, the features that have fans raving, and perhaps toss in a splash of humor for the Pokédex entry on it.

title: Pokémon Blazed Glazed
description: The Pokemon Blazed Glazed hack is based on the Emerald version, but it adds new features and improves upon existing ones.

title: Pokémon Cloud White 2
description: Following the conclusion of Pokémon Cloud White’s final adventure, the scenario kicks off. Get ready to learn about 4 new regions: South Sinnoh (Kouros), Sinnoh, and the rest of Sinnoh. In addition, Seto and Sevii appear in the downloadable content Cloud White Origins! During the course of your journey, you will work to piece together the history puzzle. Galactic and Team Rocket have joined forces to challenge you and your allies, including Professor Oak, Blue, Leaf, Ash Ketchum, and more. However, why?

title: Pokémon Clover
description: If you’ve ever fancied a Pokémon game with a twist of internet meme and a sprinkle of edginess, then Pokemon Clover is your jam. Originating from a humble reworking of Pokémon Fire Red in 2014, it has since transformed into an entirely new beast, offering new regions and a whopping 386 unique fakemon.

title: Pokémon Dark Rising
description: The story begins with a dream. A Pokemon appears unexpectedly and chooses you, a young boy/girl, to save the world.

title: Pokémon Delta Emerald
description: With the release of Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire in 2014, the Hoenn Region underwent a comprehensive makeover. This included a storyline that players were already familiar with, but which had been updated, improved, and expanded. In addition, new battle mechanisms, improved gameplay, and a great deal more were added. There was a widespread belief among some individuals that Delta Emerald would be made available simultaneously as Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire; however, this was never the case. We were never provided with the entirety of the Hoenn experience all at once.

title: Pokémon Dimension Legends
description: Crimson Stardust, a ROM hacker with the alias “Pokemon Dimension Legends,” is responsible for the creation of this new version of the classic Pokemon FireRed video game. The storyline of the game is also completely original; if you participate in it, you will play the role of Ace, a person who is known for assisting those around him whenever they are in need. Ace went back to visit his hometown in the Sterra region after listening to his late grandmother. Back in his hometown, Ace was having problems and was involved in a conflict with an organization known as Black Rose.

title: Pokémon Dragon Ball Z Team Training
description: Dragon Ball Z Team Training (Pokemon Fire Red Hack) a unique combination of the two famous brands Pokemon and Dragon Ball that has been talented as a hacker creation. This is essentially a remake of Pokemon Fire Red, with the Pokemon modified to familiar characters in the Dragon Ball Z series. The actions and tactics of the characters are perfectly simulated as in manga and anime. Now you can own the most powerful warriors in the universe to fight for themselves, nothing better than that, right?

title: Pokémon Emerald Enhanced
description: There are a total of 684 Pokémon available in Pokemon Emerald Enhanced, as well as 7 starters, 6 difficulty modes (including Nuzlocke), and a lot more to find and discover in this enhanced version of the original Pokemon Emerald game!

title: Pokémon Emerald Version
description: After the success of Pokemon Ruby and Sapphire, Nintendo continued to develop Pokemon Emerald game linking with the unfinished content. The game is set in the Hoenn region, revolving around an ambitious young Pokemon trainer. While traveling to the town of Littleroot, he met a boy from Petalburg who told him about his father and helped him get his first Pokemon, igniting the fire of his ambition to become a Pokemon trainer. However, the road to success is not easy because the front is extremely powerful enemies. After arriving in the town of Littleroot, he met two mysterious organizations, Team Magma, and Team Aqua. They are trying to change the world as their will by summoning two legendary Pokemon: Groudon and Kyogre. However, the power of these two mascots is so great that one of them refuses to obey the orders and start fighting. This wickedness has turned world peace upside-down as well as drought and floods are constantly happening. At that time, the young Pokemon trainer used his talent to summon the legendary Rayquaza Pokemon to prevent the war from destruction. However, this event opened up an area called Battle Frontier right here, at Littleroot!

title: Pokémon FireRed Version
description: Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen are modern remakes of Pokémon Red and Blue, 1996 role-playing games. These third-generation Pokémon games for the Game Boy Advance were developed by Game Freak and published by The Pokémon Company and Nintendo. They are the first enhanced remakes in the franchise, combining nostalgia with updated features and graphics. Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen return players to Kanto. This region’s Pokémon habitats, bustling towns, and intricate routes offer a rich experience for new and returning players. The games add the Sevii Islands, a new area. These islands have Johto-exclusive Pokémon and engaging post-game missions.

title: Pokémon GS Chronicles
description: A Spanish ROM hacker by the name of Ruki is responsible for the creation of Pokemon GS Chronicles, also known as the Pokemon Fire Red Hack. Ruki and a few of his buddies have been working on this project for a number of years. Their history and their conclusions will not, under any circumstances, dissatisfy you. This game is based on the original version of Pokemon Fire Red, but it presents players with an entirely new storyline as well as additional elements that have never been seen before.

title: Pokémon Liquid Crystal
description: Liquid Crystal isn’t just your ordinary ROM Hack; it’s a full-blown, upgraded, glammed-up reimagination of the classic GameBoy Color Pokémon Crystal. Designed for the GameBoy Advanced system, using FireRed as its backbone, it’s safe to say that the game invites players back into familiar stories while weaving in new, exhilarating adventures. The name “Pokémon Liquid Crystal” might just pop up five times in this article, but its features will undoubtedly keep popping in your head!

title: Pokémon Moon Emerald
description: Inspired by the original game Pokemon Emerald, a ROM hacker has created a remake called Pokemon Moon Emerald (Pokemon Emerald Hack). The story of the game remains the same with the original version, participating in the game you will become a young trainer on the journey to become a new champion in the region. On your journey you can also collect a lot of regional Pokemon, train them to meet the upcoming challenges. This version focuses on changing the old features and adding new features to make the game more interesting.

title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
description: The world is suffering from natural disasters, people are turned into Pokemon and it seems that their memories are completely lost. The players, as well as their teammates, were also victims of this disaster. When both of them trying to escape, they sought a safe shelter, which was Xatu’s home. After the conversations, he realized that the player was once a human. He revealed a legend about Ninetales, a legendary Pokemon that once cursed humans when they were trying to destroy it. Gengar, a member of Team Meanies inadvertently heard this information, immediately, a search for Ninetales was held. However, after finding it, he declared that this catastrophic event was caused by someone else, and that was Groudon. After thousands of years of a deep sleep, he woke up and caused it. A series of Pokemon was captured to become his slaves for a mysterious ally of Groudon, serving for the greatest goal, which is to conquer all of the other planets in the galaxy.

title: Pokémon Nameless
description: This is the prequel to Pokemon Mega Power and the sequel to Pokemon Resolute. However, the “sequel” part of this story simply consists of several events. You take on the role of Chronya, the young hero of the Cyenn Region, in this video game.

title: Pokémon Orange Islands
description: This innovative remake, known as Pokemon Orange Islands (Pokemon Fire Red Hack), is based on the original “Pokemon Fire Red” version that was created by a player by the name of kalarie. The popular anime served as a source of creativity for the plot. When you join the game, you will take on the role of Ash Ketchum after he has triumphed in the Indigo League and has returned to his hometown; it is from this point on that new stories will begin.

title: Pokémon Ruby Version
description: Pokemon Ruby is a co-released version with “Pokemon Sapphire” on the GBA platform. This game is set in the beautiful Hoenn land, revolving around the story of a young man with the desire to become a Pokemon trainer master. His family is preparing to move to the town of Littleroot, which has gyms and excellent Pokemon trainers. On the way, his parents said they wanted to go to Professor Birch’s house, an old friend who they had not seen him for many years. Upon arrival, an extremely chaotic scene is happening, there is a wild Pokemon attacking him. He needs the boy’s help and says he can take one of three Pokemon Treecko, Torchic or Mudkip to rescue him from the attack. To show his gratitude, the professor gave it to him. It is his first Pokemon and will also be a partner of him on his journey to explore Hoenn.

title: Pokémon Sapphire Version
description: The journey to conquer the Pokemon world begins in Hoenn. You will receive your Pet through Professor Oak as well as will be helped with written information. With the ultimate goal of becoming a championship coach, the difficulties that must be experienced last longer across eight cities and special regions, dominated by the former champions from many years ago. Regarding the Pokemon system, it’s really diverse for you to explore. The quantity is more than 150 categories, which was made up of many classes and qualities. Therefore, they possess some powerful abilities that you can harness in fights. Although the same plot is built and released in parallel with the Ruby version, there are still many differences, especially the warriors. At the same time, the developer has built links between them, allowing players to trade and interact between the two releases. This is also considered as a way to fill your collection. However, it’s not really interesting as you the way use the Pokeball to catch hordes of Pokemon in the wild, or from other players, right?

title: Pokémon Sinnoh Legacy
description: Embark on an epic journey as a 10-year-old, traversing the Sinnoh region, reminiscent of a platinum demake. But hold onto your Pokéballs! This isn’t your typical Pokémon adventure. With hackers wielding ASMagix skills that can warp the Sinnoh timeline, things are about to get wild!

title: Pokémon Sweet Version
description: Welcome to Pokémon Sweet Version, a version of the game in which battles are fought using the strength of sweets. Explore a candy-filled wonderland that looks a lot like Kanto but is actually quite different, as those who do so will quickly realize as they travel through it! Catch 151 Pokémon that have been candified to fill up all of the pages in your Cookbook. Because we have gone to such great lengths to ensure that the experience is one of a kind, we have created a brand-new flavor chart that includes a total of twelve different kinds of ice cream. (Apple is absolutely a flavor that can be found in ice cream.) And if you’re sick of Kanto, you’ll be relieved to know that this is not at all Kanto, despite the fact that it appears to be very similar to Kanto. Because the world is intended to be discovered, every map contains something that was not previously present. This could be anything from an item that has been cunningly concealed to a pun that is horrendously in poor taste. (We don’t need any more of those.) The PokéSweets themselves are every bit as tasty as they appear, and they even have an appearance that suggests they should be consumed.

title: Pokémon Sword and Shield
description: Alright, let’s craft an informative, data-driven, and slightly humorous article about Pokémon Sword and Shield GBA, using the information provided and the beloved features from the article.

title: Pokémon Theta Emerald EX
description: It’s been more than a year since I last significantly updated the first version of Theta Emerald, which featured only 650 Pokémon. After that, I made available an early version of Theta Emerald EX, which I detest to this very day. I wanted to make the game from scratch, start over, and play it from the beginning. That is what I ended up doing, and as a result, I can now confirm that the newest version of Theta Emerald EX has been released officially.

title: Pokémon Theta Emerald Renev

title: Pokémon Unbound
description: Hey Poké-enthusiasts! Skeli’s got something for y’all. Ever wondered what Pokémon would look like if it got doused in some 2023 magic? Well, it’s called Pokémon Unbound and it’s nothing short of epic. If you have the patience of a Geodude and the perseverance of an Ash Ketchum, then dive in! Not only will the main game make you rethink all your life choices, but once you’re through, there’s a post-game waiting that’s as addictive as mom’s Poké Puffs. And for battle buffs, there’s the Battle Frontier Demo. Imagine over 100 battle combos, monthly goodies, and a difficulty mode that’s basically the Dark Souls of Pokémon. Ready to embark on this rollercoaster? Buckle up!

title: Power Rangers Dino Thunder
description: During a lab study, Tommy Oliver was trapped in a massive explosion and discovered the presence of a half-human creature, half a dinosaur Mesogog. After that, he promptly fled to save his life. Many years later, he spent a lot of enthusiasm to learn and study dinosaurs, with the support of Dr. Anton Mercer. The result, after years of trying, is five stones of strength. Conner, Ethan, and Kira were once punished in Mr. Oliver’s lab, where they accidentally discovered the rocks and completely absorbed them. The teacher had no other way, so he explained the origin and revealed the difficulties in the face of Zeltrax’s terrible conspiracy.

title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
Rayman Advance
description: Glade of Dreams is a beautiful land, covered by a mysterious sphere called Great Protoon. Therefore, all citizens under protection and live happily. However, good things cannot exist forever. Mr. Dark appears to steal the Great Protoon and leaves behind the chaos. But thanks to that, the mystery of the ball was also revealed. It was created by little angels called Electoons and has been protected by Betilla for thousands of years. But now, the guard was defeated and seriously injured, while the angels dispersed and were locked in the cages of the monsters. The only way to balance things as they are is to rescue them. However, is there anyone brave enough to do this when the most powerful have been defeated? At that time, the hero Rayman appeared as a savior.

title: Rhythm Tengoku
description: I was quite surprised because in such a small package like Rhythm Tengoku contains a large number of minigames. They vary in gameplay, but mostly work based on the rhythm of the music, and are designed to be quite short to suitable for a good experience. There are many levels to try, which are designed according to the hierarchical model, with levels from easy to difficult. Based on what has been arranged, you need to pass in turn and mark the achievement achieved at the checkpoint when defeating a boss. In fact, if the person catches the rhythm fast enough, it probably won’t be a big deal. But if the D-pad control is not good enough, do not worry because the developer has enough experience to help players improve their skills through some other Minigames. The system will make an overall assessment and analysis of the results. And if you pay attention, you can grasp where your lack is to adjust accordingly.

title: Shaman King: Master of Spirits
description: The peace that the world is having makes some guys feel unhappy. Magister is one of those, as he tries to steal the Tome of the Shaman to revive the demon king. Sooner or later, evil spirits will be released, which could bring death to humans in the near future. Yoh Asakura, who has been dreaming of becoming an excellent warlock for such a long time, discovered this cruel trick, so he intervened to stop it. Thanks to the power of his light sword, you will write your story by defeating the monsters brought by Magister to the world as well as destroying the Tome of the Shaman before falling into the wrong hands. Most of the gameplay revolves around slashing, sometimes quests and interactions with NPCs to ease boredom. Of course, there will also be other features to enhance the user experience, in which the most prominent is the soul system. Characters will learn magic along with new abilities every time they acquire them. So the question is, where can one be found? And the only answer, it’s from the corpses of the people you kill (not 100%, but the frequency is sometimes).

title: Shining Soul
description: Shining Soul is gathering an army of monsters to engulf the world in death. But fortunately, at Rune, this plan was soon stopped by the young hero of Shining Fleet and locked five evil generals inside Runefaust. However, the threat is still there, and you need to eliminate the rest of the threat before it can spill out. With the stand out feature of a role-playing game, you can choose your character from one of the four available systems: warrior, archer, wizard, or dragonute. Of course, the intention of the developer when designing these four independent types is to provide different experiences for the player. They can replay the game again, with a different choice from the beginning, which won’t make players get boring. At the core, the story is different, but the function is similar and all towards the ultimate goal of destroying the army of Dark Dragon. With adventure through many lands of Rune, you will face hordes of monsters as well as interesting conversations with NPCs from the villages. Characters can develop through the level system, skills, and equipment. Of course, if you don’t get stronger with time, you’ll soon be engulfed.

title: Shining Soul II
description: Thousands of years later, since the Dark Dragon’s destruction, the darkness is gradually getting stronger while making the light weaker. An alchemist appeared and became the companion of the knight Deatharte, and also the most reliable courtiers of King Marcel. But not long after, he left behind mysteries and a forbidden fruit and then disappeared. Before his friend’s untimely departure, Deatharte was curious, investigated, and eventually banned from the country, causing his soul to be dirty.

title: Sonic Advance
description: For such a long time, Dr. Eggman has harbored a hope that he will rule the world someday with his own dark technologies. In the last time, Sonic and his friends thought that he was completely defeated in the previous battle, which took place 2 years ago. But that just isn’t it, Dr. Eggman’s return this time with a weapon capable of turning any creature into a robot, and enslave him forever. However, the natural energy source is too limited, and only emeralds are able to sustain the whole energy of this weapon. Sonic soon realized the problem so that he and his friends set out to search for the emeralds and destroy the one who is planning to destroy the Earth.

title: Sonic Advance 2
description: Doctor Eggman has returned with a terrible plan. He kidnaps all creatures, then turns them into robots. Soon, his empire will grow, and no one can stop him from conquering the world. Knuckles and Tails are also part of the plan. Naturally, when he heard the news about his friends, Sonic was furious. He immediately set out to rescue. Along the way, Sonic meets a rabbit named Cream and allows the rabbit to join the journey because her mother has also been kidnapped. However, Eggman soon fled to the space station and left the dangers to stay on Earth. The two of them have come together to solve the immediate problem, not forgetting to chase the wicked.

title: Sonic Advance 3
description: After his failed attempt to destroy the world, Doctor Eggman was robbed of everything by Sonic and his companions, including his destroyer Emerl. Fortunately, he managed to escape, and his hatred seemed to be heavier than before. With his return this time, he brought with him another robot called Gemerl, an upgraded version of Emerl, improved on technology and power. Sonic and his friends are his first targets because deep down, he understands that. If they exist, then the plan cannot succeed. Amy, Knuckles, and Cream have been kidnapped, and this means that Doctor Eggman has sent Sonic an official challenge. But, with the current power of Sonic and Tail, it is difficult to defeat Eggman and Gemerl. It seems that they need to borrow the power of the Emeralds that are hidden in the 7 dungeons they are about to face next.

title: Sonic Battle
description: Four thousand years ago, when the ancient civilization was in a flourishing period, they created a destructive weapon, called the Gizoid, in the form of a robot. But as the fading invaded, with wars everywhere, the Gizoid was buried. However, it had been unearthed by Professor Gerald Robotnik for the aim of later research. Nevertheless, it was built by ancient technologies, which is the point that made it difficult for him to analyze and even unable to operate, so he decided to abandon it at Emerald Beach. Sonic then discovered and used the emerald to make it work again. But later, he found it is a weapon programmed to destroy, and its imitating ability makes it even become more dangerous. Dr. Eggman has researched and learned about this. As the hatred arises, he wishes to awake the true nature of the Gizoid.

title: Spider-Man 2
description: Since the death of the Green Goblin, Peter has been trying to return to normal life as an ordinary student with his friends Harry Osborn and Mary Jane Wattson. On a trip to the museum together, Peter discovered a criminal organization was stealing products and causing a commotion in the streets when trying to flee. He tried to stop them but was attacked by Rhino, so he was seriously injured. Mysterio, the man who stands behind the robbery, was furious when the plan was disrupted. He stole the Statue of Liberty and forced Spider-Man into a series of magic games to kill him, but losing is what he received again. Sometime later, Octopus, a half-robot warrior, appears. He partnered with Mysterio, Rhino, and Shocker, planning a plot to destroy the world by releasing nuclear power. The Black Cat, who had once confronted Spider-Man, teamed up to stop the oncoming destruction.

title: Spider-Man 3: The Game
description: After the death of Norman Osborn, Peter seemed like his life was peaceful again with his girlfriend, Mary Jane Watson. But things will not just simple like that. Harry Osborn inadvertently found his father’s Green Goblin research and learned that Spider-Man had caused his death. This created resentment in his heart to rise. At the same time, a prisoner named Flint Marko escaped from jail and accidentally fell into a particle accelerator that he turned into a sandman. Later, Harry and Flint cooperate, as both have the same purpose of revenging Spider-Man. They cause disasters in the whole city, when trying to set bombs and kidnap innocent people to provoke enemies to appear. While trying to combat the bad guys, Peter realized that the aura in his body had been changed, which made his suit turn into black.

title: Spyro: Season of Ice
description: Never giving up his evil intent, Grendor and his army return to the dragon kingdom and imprison the mermaids. As a descendant of the throne – Sparx plans to rescue the ill-fated inhabitants and bring back the internal peace. Starting with the isometric screen, along with a dialog introduction, you will adventure through many levels to find the enemy’s lair. Grendor had known that this would come, so on the way, he set up monsters to prevent, along with the pitfalls that could cause the character to die at any time. In order not to let that happen, you need to be sophisticated enough to survive. Move, jump, fly, and even spit fire to kill hazards along the way. At the same time, don’t forget to collect the gems to accumulate points, update achievements on the leaderboards. In particular, in a few difficult periods, NPCs show up and offer help. Those could be items that increase in strength or health, or could also be the guidance of a fairy. In the dark night, what better way than light to illuminate?

title: Street Fighter Alpha 3
description: Bison is a mysterious tycoon who stands behind and secretly organizes championship tournaments for heroes and villains. Although he has never formally declared, he is seeking out the strongest ones, who own the dark dignity to join his army of assassins. After many events, it seems like he is now more terrifying than ever. He is possessing the control of extremely dangerous people, including Cody, a prison breaker who was sentenced to death and “Juli and Juni,” who are known as the scariest killers. Marking a strong comeback, Bison hosted the third Street Alpha championship tournament and decided to reveal himself, something unheard of before.

title: Super Mario Advance
description:
Two Classics, One Pak!

Super Mario Bros. 2 and Mario Bros., together in one Game Pak – and on Game Boy Advance, they're better than ever! There's all of the running, jumping, jumping, and veggie flinging that made NES Super Mario Bros. 2 a smash hit, plus new enemies and bigger items. And in the updated arcade classic Mario Bros., you can work together or have a brawl bumping off baddies and collecting coins. It all adds up to advanced Mario mayhem!

• 20 levels of fiend-infested fun! Play as Mario, Luigi, Peach and even Toad, each with unique running, jumping, and lifting abilities. Hurl an amazing array of items like bombs, turtle shells and POW blocks to topple enemies and clear the path!

• Two multiplayer modes for up to 4 players! In Single-Pak play, up to four can connect with Game Link cables and just one Game Pak. In Multi-Pak play, connect up to four Game Boy Advance systems using Game Link cables and one Game Pak per person. (Requires Game Boy Advance Game Link cable(s), sold separately.)

• Powered up play on Game Boy Advance! The world's most powerful handheld system brings you bright, colorful graphics, more on-screen enemies, and amazing voices and sound effects.

title: Super Mario Advance 2 – Super Mario World
description: After rescuing the mushroom kingdom in the Super Mario Advance version, Mario and his younger brother Luigi felt a bit tired and decided to take a vacation on the dinosaur island. However, having just arrived at the resort to book a room, they received one very bad news from Princess Peach. After the abduction, Bowser angered and abducted the princess again. With his return this time, he brought an army of savage monsters to the mushroom kingdom along with the evil minion: Koopalings. Peach has been kidnapped, this makes the mushroom kingdom becomes chaotic due to lack of the leader and being destroyed by monsters. Facing the situation that their best friend is in danger, Mario and Luigi return and embark on a journey of rescue. They promised themselves that the bad Bowser would pay for the crimes he had committed.

title: Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3
description: Bowser is a villain when he often steals kingdoms for business. In his next order, he went down to Princess Peach’s Kingdom, stole the magic wand, and opened the gate to Mushroom World. At the same time, seven versions of Koopa Kids were sent down in order to destroy peaceful lands and turn people into strange creatures. Luigi and Mario received a plea for help. They need to defeat the wicked and revoke the wand to set everything back to its original point. But things are not so easy like that when the whole Mushroom World is full of dangers, even Peach has never been there before.

title: Super Puzzle Fighter II
description: The crushing-style fighting game B on the device seems to be too familiar. Sometimes, it is considered boring because there are no new paths. Demonstrating that this is entirely possible, Capcom teamed up with the Puzzle genre and launched Super Puzzle Fighter. The article you are reading is about the second release. The idea is still the same as its predecessor, which is to join the blocks on the board to perform the corresponding action. With red blocks corresponding to attack, yellow is defense, and blue is mana supplement for special attacks. Mixing into each battle is a tactical element, to bring excitement as well as stimulate players’ thinking. This is really fun that people should exploit. Moreover, characters and graphics have been added and improved. If you’ve ever experienced the first version, then maybe you’ve been looking forward to this second part for long. I bet you will spend a lot of time immersed in this virtual world, to conquer the championship title for tournaments and real opponents on the floor.

title: Super Street Fighter II Turbo: Revival
description: Battles in Super Street Fighter II: Turbo Revival takes place in 3 rounds, based on the countervailing mechanism. The compete will stop as well as move on to the next opponent if the player earns 2 points. The gameplay of this game focuses basically on the player’s control skills, although the later the stages are, the more difficult it will increase, not in terms of strength, but about skillfulness. They need to move more quickly, know how to dodge attacks, and create combos with great damage more often to defeat the opponent.

title: Sword of Mana
description: The game begins with a dream, reminiscing about the death of a young hero’s parents. During the tribulation caused by Prince Stroud, he was lucky to escape and was taken to the city of Topple, when death is spreading everywhere in the country of Granz. Stroud has long been known as a villain when he mercilessly killed his father to succeed the throne, then claimed to be the lord of darkness and gave himself the right to control all of the citizens’ lives. In another place, a heroine has a similar situation, when her whole family was also massacred by the Dark Lord. Circumstances plunged the two together. Mutually they go to Wendell and are revealed a magic sword, originally from the Mana heroine’s clan. A hope of revenge and bringing peace is rekindled in their souls!

title: TETRIS WORLDS
description: Marking a strong comeback, the developer brought new experiences in the version “TETRIS WORLDS.” Before introducing the unique modes, I should recap the core gameplay that you may already know if you have ever experienced the previous version or any classic puzzle game. The game takes place in a board with a width of 10 units, along with many targets set as a measure of success, including score, time, and goal. While independent blocks of different shapes are being affected by gravity, causing it to fall to the bottom of the screen, players need to change different shapes to fill a line. To make it clear, the gameplay is just about arranging to delete the line, make a goal, and move to a new level. Whenever each line is removed, the goal is scored. When fully loaded, players can level up with new challenges and new targets. Scores and times will be recorded and updated on the best leaderboards.

title: Tales of Phantasia
description: Dhaos is an evil warlock. In the final battle with four unknown knights, he used magic to travel to the future, search for and seal one of the descendants of the warrior. Twelve years later, two young swordsmen, Cress and Chester, came to the town of Toltus and discovered the demon Mars Uldole destroyed it. In particular, the life of the Cress family also suffered a similar result to the villagers. When the two arrive at Euclid, they fall into a plan of stealing the necklace to bring back the revival of Dhaos. Their teammates, Morrison and Mint Adnate, appear along with hopes. Together they returned to 1000 years ago, to find a solution to defeat the powerful sorcerer. Magic is the answer, but it can only be found in the Freyland desert. The group begins the journey, though not knowing what could happen up next.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
description: Purple Dragon is a public criminal gang that is operating right in the city. They blatantly cause riots and even rob, which causes people to live in fear. But soon, when the team of four turtles: Michelangelo, Donatello, Raphael, and Leonardo appeared, their activities were prevented that they could not achieve their wanted results. Sometime later, Purple Dragon teamed up with Stockman to create destruction robots, caused a series of issues such as kidnapping people to extort money, and revenge against green heroes by burning down the houses of them. The leader Michelangelo became very angry and led his team members to destroy Stockman’s Baxter factory. It was this event that led to Stockman cooperating with The Shredder – the leader of the Foot Clan, to implement the plan of creating mutant creatures and kidnap Raphael as well.

title: Tekken Advance
description: After 15 years, since The King of the Iron Fist Tournament 2 ended, Heihachi established an organization called Tekken force with the aim of preserving peace for the world. His daughter, Jun Kazama, had a peaceful life in a mountainous region with her husband and gave birth to a baby named Jin. However, that peace was soon broken when Heihachi found an ancient tomb in the Middle East, which is believed to hold a weapon of incredible power. There is one thing they didn’t know, which is when they dug up the tomb, the seal was also broken. As a consequence, the Orchi monster was released and ate all the strongest fighters to increase its power. Jun sensed that Orchi would come for her soon so that she reminded Jin that, if something went wrong, he must come to his grandfather for help. Not long after that, she went missing on a stormy night. Jin sought Heihachi’s guidance and became a fighter when he was only 15 years old. The King of the Iron Fist 3rd is organized, with the ultimate goal of attracting Orchi as well as revenging for the crimes it has committed.

title: The Incredibles
description: THE INCREDIBLES begins with the event of the robbery of Metroville. Bomb Voyage is the mastermind of this plan. Despite being a smart and clever man, he was stopped by Mr. Incredible and destroyed shortly after. However, it is this that has raised new dangers. The wicked activists in the city become more defensive and even create threats to destroy the Incredible hero and his whole family. The appearance of the character Mirage has revealed a mysterious organization. They created the destruction machine Omnidroid 08 to devastate Nomanisan island. The hero managed to stop this, but was soon captured by Omnidroid 09 and received warnings from the owner Syndrome about a major battle about to occur. Elastigirl promptly appeared to rescue his husband. Now, the family of superheroes, including the two children Violet and Dash need to prepare for the fight to the death.

title: The King of Fighters EX2: Howling Blood
description: After Orochi was vanquished, Emperor Goenitz renewed his search for a substitute host that could channel more power than Riot of the Blood and for a way to break the seal once more so that Orochi could be resurrected. He also looked for a way to free Orochi from his imprisonment. And he is not going after anyone else in particular with this comeback; rather, Leona’s daughter is the target of his efforts. At that precise instant, a tremor occurred, which ultimately led to the deaths of the people in the immediate area, including her poor mother. Goenitz came to the conclusion that the process of reviving the devil would move along much more quickly if he were able to obtain the blood of the most powerful warrior. As a result, the KING OF FIGHTERS tournament was rescheduled and given the name THE HOWLING BLOOD this time around.

title: The King of Fighters EX: Neoblood
description: After the King of Fighters event ended, Orochi, along with his plan, aimed to set up an assassin organization to create his own riot, were buried forever. Iori Yagami, the champion who finished the life of the devil – Orochi, has also disappeared, leaving no information behind. Sometime later, famous characters who previously participated in King of Fighters were all invited to engage in a new tournament. Although many rounds have taken place and part of the members have been eliminated, the person behind the organization still has not revealed his identity yet. Moe Habana, a girl who replaces Yagami, is sent on a mission to learn about this mysterious man. And does his real purpose is about continuing the unfinished plan of the previous villain?

title: The Legend Of Zelda – A Link To The Past
The Legend of Zelda
description: The context of THE LEGEND OF ZELDA was built in a legendary land called Hyrule, where the mysterious golden triangle Triforce. One day, disaster struck the people here when the dark prince Ganon brought his army to invade Hyrule and steal the Triforce of Power, then break the golden triangle Triforce into 8 pieces, and hide them in the country so no one can recover it. Recognizing the evil purpose of the man who once covered the world in the darkness, Princess Zelda ordered her mentor Impac to leave Hyrule immediately to seek the help of those brave and mighty enough to defeat Ganon. Upon receiving this news, Ganon became angry, captured the princess and dispatched his army to pursue Impac. Luckily, when Impac was in danger, a guy named Link appeared and rescued him. Shortly thereafter, Link was reverted to all the unfortunate events that took place on Hyrule and with Princess Zelda. He resolved to defeat all enemies to bring the inherent peace back to the kingdom. But, confronts a strong opponent, who possesses Triforce of Powers, Link probably needs the help of the Golden Triforce triangle.

title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and Four Swords
description: The story of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and Four Swords begins with the return of the evil warlock Vaati. He kidnapped many young girls of the Hyrule and took them to the palace to make them become his brides. Many heroes in Hyrule had tried to fight him to rescue the girls, but no one seems to be able to survive. One day, a mysterious boy appeared and ended the madness that Vaati brought. He was sealed in a dungeon by a magic sword called Four Sword and could never escape. However, someone opened the seal, which led to the kidnapping of Princess Zelda. Before the bad hunch, Link – her close friend has researched the event and went to the dungeon where the “Four Sword” is located. As soon as he pulled the sword from its pedestal, he was divided into four identical copies, along with the four swords separated from the “Four Sword”. Fairies appeared and said that he could only find and destroy Vaati when he has 4 silver keys. They would hand it over to him, as long as he goes back to the past and collects Rupees. With no other options, Link agreed and made the journey back to the past with 4 completely different times.

title: The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap
description: Hyrule is a peaceful kingdom, of which residents all hold hands to go up and build a prosperous economy together. But then, the forces of darkness have risen and covered Hyrule with evil monsters. The gods give the hero Picori a sword god, then give him the task of saving this kingdom. With courage and light power, Hyrule has restored its inherent peace. The people want to show their gratitude for him so that they hold a festival to honor annually. In the celebration of the 100th Picori, King of Hyrule holds a tournament, and the champion will be able to touch the god Picori’s sword. Guardian Smith gives the task to Link and Princess Zelda to hand the sword to the champion. Unfortunately, Vaati, a mysterious man take it away then. He turns Zelda into stone and uses the magic sword to open the seal for the ancient demon that had caused the disaster. Painful at the death of his friend, the young man, Link sets out to search for Vaati, determines to bring the magic sword back and saves the kingdom.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: Journey to discover Middle earth begins when Frodo is tasked with protecting the Rings. Sauron is planning to steal the treasure and harness its power to engulf the world in evil, with blood and tears. You will take the role of a hobbit hero, along with the help of nine kind souls to prevent those threats. With the role-playing genre, you will adventure along the banks of the Anduin to many villages and interact with the NPCs that play a core role. Besides revealing the dignity and character like that in a novel of the same name, they will provide a number of quests and rewards, compared to the hard work. Mostly, it involves defeating the bad guys, collecting items, or resolving conflicts so as not to cause war. Character elements are quite important, and can also be developed through the upgrade system. Health, skills, and stats will be increased during this process, with the aim of making battles easier to breathe.

title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
description: Since King Neptune is bald, he is very concerned about his crown because it can hide the head of a little hair so that the residents cannot see it. But unfortunately, someone stole it while he was sleeping, so he became extremely angry. SpongeBob and Patrick were tasked with investigating, and regaining the crown before things got worse. After a while, they found out that the thief was Plankton. He sold it to criminals in Shell City. However, the journey to this city contains many dangers as they have to overcome the land containing monsters, including the giant Cyclops. However, if they were unable to retrieve Neptune’s treasure, Mr. Krabs would be blamed and punished for death.

title: Tom and Jerry Tales
description:
“TOM AND JERRY TALES” is a big part of the entertainment that probably you have been looking for for so long. Like the movie, the game does not have a binding storyline but is still organized through a series of levels. As Jerry, a brown mouse, you will mess up the house and do your favorite things: teasing cat Tom, disrupting his sleep, and driving him crazy. Yeah, it is part of the process, and this means that you will face sharp claws and dangerous mouse traps. But in return, what could be more fun?
The rest of the game is developed like the Serie Super Mario, with mainly the action element. You try to move through the map to collect pieces of cheese, while attempting to dodge traps, instead of fighting enemies. In some cases, the system also requires collecting other items such as nails, hammers, or anything that can be used to protect yourself. Of course, this is considered as a preparation for the fight with Tom.

title: Ultimate Spider-Man
description: Since the horrific events destroyed by the villains like Electro, Green Goblin, RHINO or Human Torch, Spider-Man and SHIELD forces have stopped and arrested them, returning peace to the New York City. Not long after that, the life of the people here is once again turned upside down by another character, who owns the Venom suit. After a while of trying to chase, Spider-Man got the suit, but the owner of that escaped and left bad consequences when rescuing the whole villains once captured by SHIELD. Everywhere, criminals are causing trouble, even kidnapping innocent people. Spider-Man must find the tycoon who standing behind these incidents while trying to stop those criminals doing bad things.

title: Virus Digimon
description: Digimon Virus is a very special remake that was based on the original Pokemon FireRed video game and was created by a ROM hacker who goes by the alias KlausThorne. Simply by hearing the name, you should be able to figure out what the general concept of this game is; yes, it is based on the well-known television series Digimon Adventure. In the context of the conclusion of the events of Digimon Adventure 2, the Digital World is gaining in popularity and gradually becoming overloaded. Things become more complicated as a result of the continuous occurrence of incidents. Professor Nebilim had to find a solution to this issue, so he hired five Agents, one of which was the player. The player’s objective was to travel to the Digital World and use the Digivice D-virus to capture the rogue Digimon. Digimon versions of each of the original version’s Pokemon will now appear, but the game’s other characters, maps, and items have also been meticulously recreated to look exactly like the animated film. You can also capture Digimon and use them in battle; in addition, once they reach a certain level, they can level up or even evolve. Both of these features are available to you if you play the game.

title: Wario Land 4
description: In a random reading of a newspaper, Wario accidentally learned that archaeologists had discovered the legendary golden pyramid in a dense forest. However, a series of explorers after trying to find the treasure inside seemed to had disappeared and did not return. Curious and dreaming of becoming a wealthy man, Wario got in the car and went to the ruins. After a while trying to find a way inside, a black cat appears and it seems to be trying to say something as it leads him to the center of the pyramid. Shortly thereafter, a person claiming to be the Golden Diva appears and reveals the dark plan he is about to bring to the world. At the same time, he finds out that the black cat actually is Princess Shokora – ruler of Ancient Egypt, who was cursed by that devil in a small form.

title: WarioWare, Inc. – Mega Microgame$!
description: Wario always cherished a desire to become rich and even is to turn into the wealthiest tycoon in the world. He has tried to do a lot of work, but he still doesn’t seem to find the suitability as well as his advantages to develop. One day, when the TV show was on-air, there were reports of huge profits from the gaming industry. He suddenly flashes an idea of ​​creating Microgames to cater to everyone’s entertainment needs, and of course, to bring the profits. WarioWare, Inc. was immediately founded with help from his friends. However, the workload is quite significant that it required them to work from dawn till dusk to check on the games to keep up with the release date.

title: Yoshi’s Island: Super Mario Advance 3
description: After defeating Bowser and his evil plan at Yoshi’s Island: Super Mario Advance 2, the two Mario brothers decided to reward themselves for a vacation at Yoshi Land. But not long, a bad thing happened, when their son: Baby Mario and Baby Luigi were kidnapped by strangers. In an attempt to find his father, the two babies have strayed into a mysterious door, leading to another universe, called the worlds of Yoshi Land. In fact, one of the six Koopalings set up this trap to kidnap them and forced the two Mario brothers to participate in a death game.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Dungeon Dice Monsters
description: In the past, Ryuji Otogi’s father had lost in the shadow tournament. As a sequence, he wanted him to take revenge on Yugi Mutou as well as his grandchildren. For that reason, Otogi teamed up with Pegasus to create Dungeon Dice Monsters in order to challenge his enemies. They used the Millennium Eye to eavesdrop on opponents’ thoughts and tactics, but once again took defeat.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Worldwide Edition: Stairway to the Destined Duel
description: Battle City has a legend about the Pyramids that is said to be ruled by the five most powerful ancient warriors. They possess rare cards and have the most advanced fighting techniques. But no one seems to be able to step inside the Pyramid, because five beasts called Ghoul guards it. Every year, they are set free for one day, which is known as a bloody massacre day when thousands of people were eaten. Over the years, many people have died trying to access the pyramid to destroy it. But most could not make it past Ghoul’s first gate. A young gladiator accidentally adventures to this land and hear about the “purification” of the weak every year. He became enraged that he decided to take part in furious battles to end the threat to Battle City.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! – The Sacred Cards
description: Yugi Moto and Joey Wheeler are close friends. They are practicing together to prepare for the upcoming Duel Monsters tournament in the city. In each stage of the competition, some excellent teams will have a chance to receive a Locator Cards. The first two teams to win 6 cards will go to the finals to win the championship. The last opponent Yugi’s team will face is Marik. He is a mysterious person who works with a criminal organization that specializes in stealing cards: Rare Hunters. Before the final match, he and his comrades used their cards to activate the power of the Egyptian God cards, with the ultimate goal of covering the world in the darkness and turning every single one became a slave. Before this bad thing actually happens, Yugi and his friends have to stop it, and the only solution is probably to defeat the organizer of the Duel Monsters tournament to get the first God card. But that’s not easy, since he’s also a master!
